   22: -module(gen_server_copy_SUITE).
   23: 
   24: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   25: -include_lib("kernel/include/inet.hrl").
   26: 
   27: -export([init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   28: 
   29: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, 
   30: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2]).
   31: -export([start/1, start_event_timeout/1, start_event_timeout_zero/1,
   32: 	 crash/1, loop_start_fail/1, call/1, send_request/1,
   33:          send_request_receive_reqid_collection/1,
   34:          send_request_wait_reqid_collection/1,
   35:          send_request_check_reqid_collection/1,
   36:          cast/1, cast_fast/1, continue/1, info/1, abcast/1,
   37: 	 handle_event_timeout/1,
   38:          handle_event_timeout_infinity/1,
   39:          handle_event_timeout_zero/1,
   40: 	 handle_event_timeout_plain/1,
   41:          multicall/1, multicall_down/1, multicall_remote/1,
   42:          multicall_remote_old1/1, multicall_remote_old2/1,
   43:          multicall_recv_opt_success/1,
   44:          multicall_recv_opt_timeout/1,
   45:          multicall_recv_opt_noconnection/1,
   46: 	 call_remote1/1, call_remote2/1, call_remote3/1, calling_self/1,
   47: 	 call_remote_n1/1, call_remote_n2/1, call_remote_n3/1, spec_init/1,
   48: 	 spec_init_local_registered_parent/1, 
   49: 	 spec_init_global_registered_parent/1,
   50: 	 otp_5854/1, hibernate/1, auto_hibernate/1, otp_7669/1, call_format_status/1,
   51: 	 error_format_status/1, terminate_crash_format/1, crash_in_format_status/1,
   52:          throw_in_format_status/1, format_all_status/1,
   53: 	 get_state/1, replace_state/1, call_with_huge_message_queue/1,
   54: 	 undef_handle_call/1, undef_handle_cast/1, undef_handle_info/1,
   55: 	 undef_init/1, undef_code_change/1, undef_terminate1/1,
   56: 	 undef_terminate2/1, undef_in_terminate/1, undef_in_handle_info/1,
   57: 	 undef_handle_continue/1,
   58: 
   59:          format_log_1/1, format_log_2/1, format_log_with_process_label/1,
   60:          reply_by_alias_with_payload/1
   61: 	]).
   62: 
   63: -export([stop1/1, stop2/1, stop3/1, stop4/1, stop5/1, stop6/1, stop7/1,
   64: 	 stop8/1, stop9/1, stop10/1]).
   65: 
   66: %% spawn export
   67: -export([spec_init_local/2, spec_init_global/2, spec_init_via/2,
   68: 	 spec_init_default_timeout/2, spec_init_global_default_timeout/2,
   69:          spec_init_anonymous/1,
   70: 	 spec_init_anonymous_default_timeout/1,
   71: 	 spec_init_not_proc_lib/1,
   72: 	 spec_init_action/2,
   73: 	 cast_fast_messup/0]).
   74: 
   75: %% Internal test specific exports
   76: -export([multicall_srv_ctrlr/2, multicall_suspender/2]).
   77: 
   78: %% The gen_server_copy behaviour
   79: -export([init/1, handle_call/3, handle_cast/2, handle_continue/2,
   80: 	 handle_info/2, code_change/3, terminate/2, format_status/2]).
   81: 
   82: %% This module needs to compile on old nodes...
   83: -ifndef(CT_PEER).
   84: -define(CT_PEER(), {ok, undefined, undefined}).
   85: -define(CT_PEER(Opts), {ok, undefined, undefined}).
   86: -endif.
   87: -ifndef(CT_PEER_REL).
   88: -define(CT_PEER_REL(Opts, Release, PrivDir), {ok, undefined, undefined}).
   89: -endif.
   90: 
   91: suite() ->
   92:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   93:      {timetrap,{minutes,1}}].
   94: 
   95: all() -> 
   96:     [start, start_event_timeout, start_event_timeout_zero,
   97:      {group,stop}, crash, loop_start_fail, call, send_request,
   98:      send_request_receive_reqid_collection, send_request_wait_reqid_collection,
   99:      send_request_check_reqid_collection, cast, cast_fast, info, abcast,
  100:      continue, handle_event_timeout,
  101:      handle_event_timeout_infinity,
  102:      handle_event_timeout_zero,
  103:      handle_event_timeout_plain,
  104:      {group, multi_call},
  105:      call_remote1, call_remote2, calling_self,
  106:      call_remote3, call_remote_n1, call_remote_n2,
  107:      call_remote_n3, spec_init,
  108:      spec_init_local_registered_parent,
  109:      spec_init_global_registered_parent, otp_5854, hibernate, auto_hibernate,
  110:      otp_7669,
  111:      {group, format_status},
  112:      get_state, replace_state,
  113:      call_with_huge_message_queue, {group, undef_callbacks},
  114:      undef_in_terminate, undef_in_handle_info,
  115:      format_log_1, format_log_2, format_log_with_process_label,
  116:      reply_by_alias_with_payload].
  117: 
  118: groups() -> 
  119:     [{stop, [],
  120:       [stop1, stop2, stop3, stop4, stop5, stop6, stop7, stop8, stop9, stop10]},
  121:      {multi_call, [], [{group, multi_call_parallel}, {group, multi_call_sequence}]},
  122:      {multi_call_parallel, [parallel],
  123:       [multicall, multicall_down, multicall_remote, multicall_remote_old1,
  124:        multicall_remote_old2]},
  125:      {multi_call_sequence, [],
  126:       [multicall_recv_opt_success, multicall_recv_opt_timeout,
  127:        multicall_recv_opt_noconnection]},
  128:      {format_status, [],
  129:       [call_format_status, error_format_status, terminate_crash_format,
  130:        crash_in_format_status, throw_in_format_status, format_all_status]},
  131:      {undef_callbacks, [],
  132:       [undef_handle_call, undef_handle_cast, undef_handle_info, undef_handle_continue,
  133:        undef_init, undef_code_change, undef_terminate1, undef_terminate2]}].
  134: 
  135: 
  136: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  137:     DataDir = ?config(data_dir, Config),
  138:     Server = filename:join(DataDir, "format_status_server.erl"),
  139:     {ok, format_status_server} = compile:file(Server),
  140:     Config.
  141: 
  142: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  143:     ok.
  144: 
  145: init_per_group(undef_callbacks, Config) ->
  146:     DataDir = ?config(data_dir, Config),
  147:     Server = filename:join(DataDir, "oc_server.erl"),
  148:     {ok, oc_server} = compile:file(Server),
  149:     Config;
  150: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  151:     Config.
  152: 
  153: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  154:     Config.
  155: 
  156: 
  157: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) when Case == call_remote1;
  158: 				     Case == call_remote2;
  159: 				     Case == call_remote3;
  160: 				     Case == call_remote_n1;
  161: 				     Case == call_remote_n2;
  162: 				     Case == call_remote_n3;
  163:                                      Case == send_request ->
  164:     {ok,Peer,Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
  165:     ok = global:sync(),
  166:     [{node,Node}, {peer, Peer} | Config];
  167: 
  168: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
  169:     Config.
  170: 
  171: end_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
  172:     case proplists:get_value(peer, Config) of
  173: 	undefined ->
  174: 	    ok;
  175: 	Peer ->
  176: 	    try peer:stop(Peer)
  177:             catch exit : noproc ->
  178:                     ok
  179:             end
  180:     end,
  181:     ok.
  182: 
  183: 
  184: %% --------------------------------------
  185: %% Start and stop a gen_server_copy.
  186: %% --------------------------------------
  187: 
  188: start(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  189:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  190: 
  191:     %% anonymous
  192:     io:format("anonymous~n", []),
  193:     {ok, Pid0} = gen_server_copy:start(gen_server_copy_SUITE, [], []),
  194:     ok = gen_server_copy:call(Pid0, started_p),
  195:     ok = gen_server_copy:call(Pid0, stop),
  196:     busy_wait_for_process(Pid0,600),
  197:     {'EXIT', {noproc,_}} = (catch gen_server_copy:call(Pid0, started_p, 1)),
  198: 
  199:     %% anonymous with timeout
  200:     io:format("try init timeout~n", []),
  201:     {ok, Pid00} = gen_server_copy:start(gen_server_copy_SUITE, [],
  202: 				   [{timeout,1000}]),
  203:     ok = gen_server_copy:call(Pid00, started_p),
  204:     ok = gen_server_copy:call(Pid00, stop),
  205:     {error, timeout} = gen_server_copy:start(gen_server_copy_SUITE, sleep,
  206: 					[{timeout,100}]),
  207: 
  208:     %% anonymous with ignore
  209:     io:format("try init ignore~n", []),
  210:     ignore = gen_server_copy:start(gen_server_copy_SUITE, ignore, []),
  211: 
  212:     %% anonymous with shutdown
  213:     io:format("try init shutdown~n", []),
  214:     {error, foobar} =
  215:         gen_server_copy:start(gen_server_copy_SUITE, {error, foobar}, []),
  216: 
  217:     %% anonymous with stop
  218:     io:format("try init stop~n", []),
  219:     {error, stopped} = gen_server_copy:start(gen_server_copy_SUITE, stop, []),
  220: 
  221:     %% anonymous linked
  222:     {ok, Pid1} =
  223: 	gen_server_copy:start_link(gen_server_copy_SUITE, [], []),
  224:     ok = gen_server_copy:call(Pid1, started_p),
  225:     ok = gen_server_copy:call(Pid1, stop),
  226:     receive
  227: 	{'EXIT', Pid1, stopped} ->
  228: 	    ok
  229:     after 5000 ->
  230: 	    ct:fail(not_stopped)
  231:     end,
  232: 
  233:     %% anonymous monitored
  234:     {ok, {Pid1b, Mon1b}} =
  235: 	gen_server_copy:start_monitor(gen_server_copy_SUITE, [], []),
  236:     ok = gen_server_copy:call(Pid1b, started_p),
  237:     ok = gen_server_copy:call(Pid1b, stop),
  238:     receive
  239: 	{'DOWN', Mon1b, process, Pid1b, stopped} ->
  240: 	    ok
  241:     after 5000 ->
  242: 	    ct:fail(not_stopped)
  243:     end,
  244: 
  245:     %% local register
  246:     {ok, Pid2} =
  247: 	gen_server_copy:start({local, my_test_name},
  248: 			 gen_server_copy_SUITE, [], []),
  249:     ok = gen_server_copy:call(my_test_name, started_p),
  250:     {error, {already_started, Pid2}} =
  251: 	gen_server_copy:start({local, my_test_name},
  252: 			 gen_server_copy_SUITE, [], []),
  253:     ok = gen_server_copy:call(my_test_name, stop),
  254: 
  255:     busy_wait_for_process(Pid2,600),
  256: 
  257:     {'EXIT', {noproc,_}} = (catch gen_server_copy:call(Pid2, started_p, 10)),
  258: 
  259:     %% local register linked
  260:     {ok, Pid3} =
  261: 	gen_server_copy:start_link({local, my_test_name},
  262: 			      gen_server_copy_SUITE, [], []), 
  263:     ok = gen_server_copy:call(my_test_name, started_p),
  264:     {error, {already_started, Pid3}} =
  265: 	gen_server_copy:start({local, my_test_name},
  266: 			 gen_server_copy_SUITE, [], []),
  267:     ok = gen_server_copy:call(my_test_name, stop),
  268:     receive
  269: 	{'EXIT', Pid3, stopped} ->
  270: 	    ok
  271:     after 5000 ->
  272: 	    ct:fail(not_stopped)
  273:     end,
  274: 
  275:     %% local register monitored
  276:     {ok, {Pid3b, Mon3b}} =
  277: 	gen_server_copy:start_monitor({local, my_test_name},
  278:                                  gen_server_copy_SUITE, [], []), 
  279:     ok = gen_server_copy:call(my_test_name, started_p),
  280:     {error, {already_started, Pid3b}} =
  281: 	gen_server_copy:start_monitor({local, my_test_name},
  282:                                  gen_server_copy_SUITE, [], []),
  283:     ok = gen_server_copy:call(my_test_name, stop),
  284:     receive
  285: 	{'DOWN', Mon3b, process, Pid3b, stopped} ->
  286: 	    ok
  287:     after 5000 ->
  288: 	    ct:fail(not_stopped)
  289:     end,
  290: 
  291:     %% global register
  292:     {ok, Pid4} =
  293: 	gen_server_copy:start({global, my_test_name},
  294: 			 gen_server_copy_SUITE, [], []),
  295:     ok = gen_server_copy:call({global, my_test_name}, started_p),
  296:     {error, {already_started, Pid4}} =
  297: 	gen_server_copy:start({global, my_test_name},
  298: 			 gen_server_copy_SUITE, [], []),
  299:     ok = gen_server_copy:call({global, my_test_name}, stop),
  300:     busy_wait_for_process(Pid4,600),
  301:     {'EXIT', {noproc,_}} = (catch gen_server_copy:call(Pid4, started_p, 10)),
  302: 
  303:     %% global register linked
  304:     {ok, Pid5} =
  305: 	gen_server_copy:start_link({global, my_test_name},
  306: 			      gen_server_copy_SUITE, [], []), 
  307:     ok = gen_server_copy:call({global, my_test_name}, started_p),
  308:     {error, {already_started, Pid5}} =
  309: 	gen_server_copy:start({global, my_test_name},
  310: 			 gen_server_copy_SUITE, [], []),
  311:     ok = gen_server_copy:call({global, my_test_name}, stop),
  312:     receive
  313: 	{'EXIT', Pid5, stopped} ->
  314: 	    ok
  315:     after 5000 ->
  316: 	    ct:fail(not_stopped)
  317:     end,
  318: 
  319:     %% global register monitored
  320:     {ok, {Pid5b, Mon5b}} =
  321: 	gen_server_copy:start_monitor({global, my_test_name},
  322:                                  gen_server_copy_SUITE, [], []), 
  323:     ok = gen_server_copy:call({global, my_test_name}, started_p),
  324:     {error, {already_started, Pid5b}} =
  325: 	gen_server_copy:start_monitor({global, my_test_name},
  326:                                  gen_server_copy_SUITE, [], []),
  327:     ok = gen_server_copy:call({global, my_test_name}, stop),
  328:     receive
  329: 	{'DOWN', Mon5b, process, Pid5b, stopped} ->
  330: 	    ok
  331:     after 5000 ->
  332: 	    ct:fail(not_stopped)
  333:     end,
  334: 
  335:     %% via register
  336:     dummy_via:reset(),
  337:     {ok, Pid6} =
  338: 	gen_server_copy:start({via, dummy_via, my_test_name},
  339: 			 gen_server_copy_SUITE, [], []),
  340:     ok = gen_server_copy:call({via, dummy_via, my_test_name}, started_p),
  341:     {error, {already_started, Pid6}} =
  342: 	gen_server_copy:start({via, dummy_via, my_test_name},
  343: 			 gen_server_copy_SUITE, [], []),
  344:     ok = gen_server_copy:call({via, dummy_via, my_test_name}, stop),
  345:     busy_wait_for_process(Pid6,600),
  346:     {'EXIT', {noproc,_}} = (catch gen_server_copy:call(Pid6, started_p, 10)),
  347: 
  348:     %% via register linked
  349:     dummy_via:reset(),
  350:     {ok, Pid7} =
  351: 	gen_server_copy:start_link({via, dummy_via, my_test_name},
  352: 			      gen_server_copy_SUITE, [], []),
  353:     ok = gen_server_copy:call({via, dummy_via, my_test_name}, started_p),
  354:     {error, {already_started, Pid7}} =
  355: 	gen_server_copy:start({via, dummy_via, my_test_name},
  356: 			 gen_server_copy_SUITE, [], []),
  357:     ok = gen_server_copy:call({via, dummy_via, my_test_name}, stop),
  358:     receive
  359: 	{'EXIT', Pid7, stopped} ->
  360: 	    ok
  361:     after 5000 ->
  362: 	    ct:fail(not_stopped)
  363:     end,
  364:     receive
  365: 	Msg -> ct:fail({unexpected,Msg})
  366:     after 1 -> ok
  367:     end,
  368: 
  369:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl),
  370:     ok.
  371: 
  372: start_event_timeout(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  373:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  374: 
  375:     lists:foreach(
  376: 	fun({StartFun, Arg, Interrupt}) ->
  377: 	    {ok, Pid} = StartFun(Arg),
  378: 	    sys:get_status(Pid),
  379: 	    case element(1, Arg) of
  380: 		timeout ->
  381: 		    is_not_hibernated(Pid);
  382: 		continue_timeout ->
  383: 		    is_not_hibernated(Pid);
  384: 		hibernate ->
  385: 		    is_hibernated(Pid);
  386: 		continue_hibernate ->
  387: 		    is_hibernated(Pid)
  388: 	    end,
  389: 	    case Interrupt of
  390: 		true ->
  391: 		    pong = gen_server_copy:call(Pid, ping);
  392: 		false ->
  393: 		    ok
  394: 	    end,
  395: 	    receive
  396: 		{Pid, event_timeout} ->
  397: 		    not Interrupt orelse ct:fail(event_timeout_message_received)
  398: 	    after 1000 ->
  399: 		Interrupt orelse ct:fail(event_timeout_message_not_received)
  400: 	    end,
  401: 	    is_not_hibernated(Pid),
  402: 	    ok = gen_server_copy:call(Pid, stop),
  403: 	    receive
  404: 		{'EXIT', Pid, _} ->
  405: 		    ok
  406: 	    after 5000 ->
  407: 		ct:fail(gen_server_copy_did_not_die)
  408: 	    end
  409: 	end,
  410: 	[{StartFun, Arg, Interrupt} || StartFun <- [fun(X) -> start_link(spec_init_action, [[], X]) end,
  411: 						    fun(X) -> gen_server_copy:start_link(gen_server_copy_SUITE, X, []) end],
  412: 				       Arg <- [{timeout, 500, self()},
  413: 					       {timeout, 500, self(), relative},
  414: 					       {timeout, 500, self(), absolute},
  415: 					       {continue_timeout, 500, self()},
  416: 					       {continue_timeout, 500, self(), relative},
  417: 					       {continue_timeout, 500, self(), absolute},
  418: 					       {hibernate, 500, self()},
  419: 					       {hibernate, 500, self(), relative},
  420: 					       {hibernate, 500, self(), absolute},
  421: 					       {continue_hibernate, 500, self()},
  422: 					       {continue_hibernate, 500, self(), relative},
  423: 					       {continue_hibernate, 500, self(), absolute}],
  424: 				       Interrupt <- [false, true]]),
  425: 
  426:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl),
  427:     ok.
  428: 
  429: start_event_timeout_zero(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  430:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  431: 
  432:     lists:foreach(
  433: 	fun({StartFun, Arg}) ->
  434: 	    {ok, Pid} = StartFun(Arg),
  435: 	    receive
  436: 		{Pid, after_event_timeout_zero} ->
  437: 		    ct:fail(after_event_timeout_zero_message_received);
  438: 		{Pid, event_timeout} ->
  439: 		    ok
  440: 	    after 1000 ->
  441: 		ct:fail(event_timeout_message_not_received)
  442: 	    end,
  443: 	    receive
  444: 		{Pid, after_event_timeout_zero} ->
  445: 		    ok
  446: 	    after 1000 ->
  447: 		ct:fail(after_event_timeout_zero_message_not_received)
  448: 	    end,
  449: 	    is_not_hibernated(Pid),
  450: 	    ok = gen_server_copy:call(Pid, stop),
  451: 	    receive
  452: 		{'EXIT', Pid, _} ->
  453: 		    ok
  454: 	    after 5000 ->
  455: 		ct:fail(gen_server_copy_did_not_die)
  456: 	    end
  457: 	end,
  458: 	[{StartFun, Arg} || StartFun <- [fun(X) -> start_link(spec_init_action, [[], X]) end,
  459: 					 fun(X) -> gen_server_copy:start_link(gen_server_copy_SUITE, X, []) end],
  460: 			    Arg <- [{timeout_zero, self()},
  461: 				    {continue_timeout_zero, self()},
  462: 				    {hibernate_zero, self()},
  463: 				    {continue_hibernate_zero, self()}]]),
  464: 
  465:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl),
  466:     ok.
  467: 
  468: %% Anonymous, reason 'normal'
  469: stop1(_Config) ->
  470:     {ok, Pid} = gen_server_copy:start(?MODULE, [], []),
  471:     ok = gen_server_copy:stop(Pid),
  472:     false = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid),
  473:     {'EXIT',noproc} = (catch gen_server_copy:stop(Pid)),
  474:     ok.
  475: 
  476: %% Anonymous, other reason
  477: stop2(_Config) ->
  478:     {ok,Pid} = gen_server_copy:start(?MODULE, [], []),
  479:     ok = gen_server_copy:stop(Pid, other_reason, infinity),
  480:     false = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid),
  481:     ok.
  482: 
  483: %% Anonymous, invalid timeout
  484: stop3(_Config) ->
  485:     {ok,Pid} = gen_server_copy:start(?MODULE, [], []),
  486:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch gen_server_copy:stop(Pid, other_reason, invalid_timeout)),
  487:     true = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid),
  488:     ok = gen_server_copy:stop(Pid),
  489:     false = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid),
  490:     ok.
  491: 
  492: %% Registered name
  493: stop4(_Config) ->
  494:     {ok,Pid} = gen_server_copy:start({local,to_stop},?MODULE, [], []),
  495:     ok = gen_server_copy:stop(to_stop),
  496:     false = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid),
  497:     {'EXIT',noproc} = (catch gen_server_copy:stop(to_stop)),
  498:     ok.
  499: 
  500: %% Registered name and local node
  501: stop5(_Config) ->
  502:     {ok,Pid} = gen_server_copy:start({local,to_stop},?MODULE, [], []),
  503:     ok = gen_server_copy:stop({to_stop,node()}),
  504:     false = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid),
  505:     {'EXIT',noproc} = (catch gen_server_copy:stop({to_stop,node()})),
  506:     ok.
  507: 
  508: %% Globally registered name
  509: stop6(_Config) ->
  510:     {ok, Pid} = gen_server_copy:start({global, to_stop}, ?MODULE, [], []),
  511:     ok = gen_server_copy:stop({global,to_stop}),
  512:     false = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid),
  513:     {'EXIT',noproc} = (catch gen_server_copy:stop({global,to_stop})),
  514:     ok.
  515: 
  516: %% 'via' registered name
  517: stop7(_Config) ->
  518:     dummy_via:reset(),
  519:     {ok, Pid} = gen_server_copy:start({via, dummy_via, to_stop},
  520: 				 ?MODULE, [], []),
  521:     ok = gen_server_copy:stop({via, dummy_via, to_stop}),
  522:     false = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid),
  523:     {'EXIT',noproc} = (catch gen_server_copy:stop({via, dummy_via, to_stop})),
  524:     ok.
  525: 
  526: %% Anonymous on remote node
  527: stop8(_Config) ->
  528:     {ok,Peer,Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
  529:     Dir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
  530:     rpc:call(Node,code,add_path,[Dir]),
  531:     {ok, Pid} = rpc:call(Node,gen_server_copy,start,[?MODULE,[],[]]),
  532:     ok = gen_server_copy:stop(Pid),
  533:     false = rpc:call(Node,erlang,is_process_alive,[Pid]),
  534:     {'EXIT',noproc} = (catch gen_server_copy:stop(Pid)),
  535:     peer:stop(Peer),
  536:     {'EXIT',{{nodedown,Node},_}} = (catch gen_server_copy:stop(Pid)),
  537:     ok.
  538: 
  539: %% Registered name on remote node
  540: stop9(_Config) ->
  541:     {ok,Peer,Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
  542:     Dir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
  543:     rpc:call(Node,code,add_path,[Dir]),
  544:     {ok, Pid} = rpc:call(Node,gen_server_copy,start,[{local,to_stop},?MODULE,[],[]]),
  545:     ok = gen_server_copy:stop({to_stop,Node}),
  546:     undefined = rpc:call(Node,erlang,whereis,[to_stop]),
  547:     false = rpc:call(Node,erlang,is_process_alive,[Pid]),
  548:     {'EXIT',noproc} = (catch gen_server_copy:stop({to_stop,Node})),
  549:     peer:stop(Peer),
  550:     {'EXIT',{{nodedown,Node},_}} = (catch gen_server_copy:stop({to_stop,Node})),
  551:     ok.
  552: 
  553: %% Globally registered name on remote node
  554: stop10(_Config) ->
  555:     {ok,Peer,Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
  556:     Dir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
  557:     rpc:call(Node,code,add_path,[Dir]),
  558:     {ok, Pid} = rpc:call(Node,gen_server_copy,start,[{global,to_stop},?MODULE,[],[]]),
  559:     ok = global:sync(),
  560:     ok = gen_server_copy:stop({global,to_stop}),
  561:     false = rpc:call(Node,erlang,is_process_alive,[Pid]),
  562:     {'EXIT',noproc} = (catch gen_server_copy:stop({global,to_stop})),
  563:     peer:stop(Peer),
  564:     {'EXIT',noproc} = (catch gen_server_copy:stop({global,to_stop})),
  565:     ok.
  566: 
  567: crash(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  568:     error_logger_forwarder:register(),
  569: 
  570:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  571: 
  572:     %% This crash should not generate a crash report.
  573:     {ok,Pid0} = gen_server_copy:start_link(?MODULE, [], []),
  574:     {'EXIT',{{shutdown,reason},_}} =
  575:  	(catch gen_server_copy:call(Pid0, shutdown_reason)),
  576:     receive {'EXIT',Pid0,{shutdown,reason}} -> ok end,
  577: 
  578:     %% This crash should not generate a crash report.
  579:     {ok,Pid1} = gen_server_copy:start_link(?MODULE, {state,state1}, []),
  580:     {'EXIT',{{shutdown,stop_reason},_}} =
  581: 	(catch gen_server_copy:call(Pid1, stop_shutdown_reason)),
  582:     receive {'EXIT',Pid1,{shutdown,stop_reason}} -> ok end,
  583: 
  584:     %% This crash should not generate a crash report.
  585:     {ok,Pid2} = gen_server_copy:start_link(?MODULE, [], []),
  586:     {'EXIT',{shutdown,_}} =
  587:  	(catch gen_server_copy:call(Pid2, exit_shutdown)),
  588:     receive {'EXIT',Pid2,shutdown} -> ok end,
  589: 
  590:     %% This crash should not generate a crash report.
  591:     {ok,Pid3} = gen_server_copy:start_link(?MODULE, {state,state3}, []),
  592:     {'EXIT',{shutdown,_}} =
  593: 	(catch gen_server_copy:call(Pid3, stop_shutdown)),
  594:     receive {'EXIT',Pid3,shutdown} -> ok end,
  595: 
  596:     process_flag(trap_exit, false),
  597: 
  598:     %% This crash should generate a crash report and a report
  599:     %% from gen_server_copy.
  600:     {ok,Pid4} = gen_server_copy:start(?MODULE, {state,state4}, []),
  601:     {'EXIT',{crashed,_}} = (catch gen_server_copy:call(Pid4, crash)),
  602:     ClientPid = self(),
  603:     receive
  604: 	{error,_GroupLeader4,{Pid4,
  605: 			      "** Generic server"++_,
  606: 			      [Pid4,crash,{formatted, state4},
  607: 			       {crashed,[{?MODULE,handle_call,3,_}
  608: 					 |_Stacktrace]},
  609: 			       ClientPid, [_|_] = _ClientStack]}} ->
  610: 	    ok;
  611: 	Other4a ->
  612: 	    io:format("Unexpected: ~p", [Other4a]),
  613: 	    ct:fail(failed)
  614:     end,
  615:     receive
  616: 	{error_report,_,{Pid4,crash_report,[List4|_]}} ->
  617: 	    {exit,crashed,[{?MODULE, handle_call, 3, _}|_]} = proplists:get_value(error_info, List4),
  618: 	    Pid4 = proplists:get_value(pid, List4);
  619: 	Other4 ->
  620: 	    io:format("Unexpected: ~p", [Other4]),
  621: 	    ct:fail(failed)
  622:     end,
  623: 
  624:     receive
  625: 	Any ->
  626: 	    io:format("Unexpected: ~p", [Any]),
  627: 	    ct:fail(failed)
  628:     after 500 ->
  629: 	    ok
  630:     end,
  631: 
  632:     ok.
  633: 
  634: 
  635: loop_start_fail(Config) ->
  636:     _ = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  637:     loop_start_fail(
  638:       Config,
  639:       [{start, []}, {start, [link]},
  640:        {start_link, []},
  641:        {start_monitor, [link]}, {start_monitor, []}]).
  642: 
  643: loop_start_fail(_Config, []) ->
  644:     ok;
  645: loop_start_fail(Config, [{Start, Opts} | Start_Opts]) ->
  646:     loop_start_fail(
  647:       fun gen_server_copy:Start/3,
  648:       {ets, {return, {stop, failed_to_start}}}, Opts,
  649:       fun ({error, failed_to_start}) -> ok end),
  650:     loop_start_fail(
  651:       fun gen_server_copy:Start/3,
  652:       {ets, {return, ignore}}, Opts,
  653:       fun (ignore) -> ok end),
  654:     loop_start_fail(
  655:       fun gen_server_copy:Start/3,
  656:       {ets, {return, 4711}}, Opts,
  657:       fun ({error, {bad_return_value, 4711}}) -> ok end),
  658:     loop_start_fail(
  659:       fun gen_server_copy:Start/3,
  660:       {ets, {crash, error, bailout}}, Opts,
  661:       fun ({error, {bailout, ST}}) when is_list(ST) -> ok end),
  662:     loop_start_fail(
  663:       fun gen_server_copy:Start/3,
  664:       {ets, {crash, exit, bailout}}, Opts,
  665:       fun ({error, bailout}) -> ok end),
  666:     loop_start_fail(
  667:       fun gen_server_copy:Start/3,
  668:       {ets, {wait, 1000, void}}, [{timeout, 200} | Opts],
  669:       fun ({error, timeout}) -> ok end),
  670:     loop_start_fail(Config, Start_Opts).
  671: 
  672: loop_start_fail(GenStartFun, Arg, Opts, ValidateFun) ->
  673:     loop_start_fail(GenStartFun, Arg, Opts, ValidateFun, 5).
  674: %%
  675: loop_start_fail(_GenStartFun, _Arg, _Opts, _ValidateFun, 0) ->
  676:     ok;
  677: loop_start_fail(GenStartFun, Arg, Opts, ValidateFun, N) ->
  678:     ok = ValidateFun(GenStartFun(?MODULE, Arg, Opts)),
  679:     loop_start_fail(GenStartFun, Arg, Opts, ValidateFun, N - 1).
  680: 
  681: 
  682: 
  683: %% --------------------------------------
  684: %% Test gen_server_copy:call and handle_call.
  685: %% Test all different return values from
  686: %% handle_call.
  687: %% --------------------------------------
  688: 
  689: call(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  690:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  691: 
  692:     {ok, _Pid} =
  693: 	gen_server_copy:start_link({local, my_test_name},
  694: 			      gen_server_copy_SUITE, [], []),
  695: 
  696:     ok = gen_server_copy:call(my_test_name, started_p),
  697:     delayed = gen_server_copy:call(my_test_name, {delayed_answer,1}),
  698: 
  699:     %% two requests within a specified time.
  700:     ok = gen_server_copy:call(my_test_name, {call_within, 1000}),
  701:     timer:sleep(500),
  702:     ok = gen_server_copy:call(my_test_name, next_call),
  703:     ok = gen_server_copy:call(my_test_name, {call_within, 1000}),
  704:     timer:sleep(1500),
  705:     false = gen_server_copy:call(my_test_name, next_call),
  706: 
  707:     %% timeout call.
  708:     delayed = gen_server_copy:call(my_test_name, {delayed_answer,1}, 30),
  709:     {'EXIT',{timeout,_}} =
  710: 	(catch gen_server_copy:call(my_test_name, {delayed_answer,30}, 1)),
  711: 
  712:     %% bad return value in the gen_server_copy loop from handle_call.
  713:     {'EXIT',{{bad_return_value, badreturn},_}} =
  714: 	(catch gen_server_copy:call(my_test_name, badreturn)),
  715: 
  716:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl),
  717:     ok.
  718: 
  719: %% --------------------------------------
  720: %% Test gen_server_copy:send_request.
  721: %% --------------------------------------
  722: 
  723: send_request(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  724:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  725: 
  726:     {ok, Pid} = gen_server_copy:start_link({local, my_test_name},
  727:                                       gen_server_copy_SUITE, [], []),
  728: 
  729:     Async = fun(Process, Req) ->
  730:                     try
  731:                         Promise = gen_server_copy:send_request(Process, Req),
  732:                         gen_server_copy:wait_response(Promise, infinity)
  733:                     catch _:Reason:ST ->
  734:                             {'did_exit', Reason, ST}
  735:                     end
  736:             end,
  737:     {reply,ok} = Async(my_test_name, started_p),
  738: 
  739:     {reply,delayed} = Async(Pid, {delayed_answer,1}),
  740: 
  741:     %% two requests within a specified time.
  742:     Promise1 = gen_server_copy:send_request(my_test_name, {call_within, 1000}),
  743:     Promise2 = gen_server_copy:send_request(my_test_name, next_call),
  744:     {reply, ok} = gen_server_copy:wait_response(Promise1, infinity),
  745:     {reply, ok} = gen_server_copy:wait_response(Promise2, infinity),
  746: 
  747:     Promise3 = gen_server_copy:send_request(my_test_name, {call_within, 1000}),
  748:     no_reply = gen_server_copy:check_response({foo, bar}, Promise3),
  749:     receive {[alias|Ref],_} = Msg when is_reference(Ref) ->
  750:             {reply, ok} = gen_server_copy:check_response(Msg, Promise3)
  751:     after 1000 ->
  752:             %% Format changed which is ok. This test is just to make you
  753:             %% aware that you have changed it
  754:             exit(message_format_changed)
  755:     end,
  756:     timer:sleep(1500),
  757: 
  758:     {reply, false} = Async(my_test_name, next_call),
  759: 
  760:     %% timeout
  761:     Promise5 = gen_server_copy:send_request(my_test_name, {delayed_answer,50}),
  762:     timeout = gen_server_copy:wait_response(Promise5, 0),
  763:     {reply, delayed} = gen_server_copy:wait_response(Promise5, infinity),
  764: 
  765:     %% bad return value in the gen_server_copy loop from handle_call.
  766:     {error,{{bad_return_value, badreturn},_}} = Async(my_test_name, badreturn),
  767: 
  768:     %% Test other error cases
  769:     {error, {noproc,_}} = Async(Pid, started_p),
  770:     {error, {noproc,_}} = Async(my_test_name, started_p),
  771:     {error, {noconnection, _}} = Async({my_test_name, foo@node}, started_p),
  772: 
  773:     {error, {noproc,_}} = Async({global, non_existing}, started_p),
  774:     catch exit(whereis(dummy_via), foo),
  775:     {'EXIT', {badarg,_}} =
  776:         (catch gen_server_copy:send_request({via, dummy_via, non_existing}, started_p)),
  777: 
  778:     %% Remote nodes
  779:     Via = dummy_via:reset(),
  780:     Remote = proplists:get_value(node,Config),
  781:     {ok, RPid} = rpc:call(Remote, gen_server_copy, start, [{global, remote}, ?MODULE, [], []]),
  782:     dummy_via:register_name(remote, RPid),
  783:     {reply, ok} = Async(RPid, started_p),
  784:     {reply, ok} = Async({global, remote}, started_p),
  785:     {reply, ok} = Async({via, dummy_via, remote}, started_p),
  786:     {error, {shutdown, _}} = Async({global, remote}, stop_shutdown),
  787:     {error, {noproc, _}} = Async({global, remote}, started_p),
  788:     {error, {noproc, _}} = Async({via, dummy_via, remote}, started_p),
  789:     {error, {noproc, _}} = Async({via, dummy_via, non_existing}, started_p),
  790: 
  791:     {ok, _} = rpc:call(Remote, gen_server_copy, start, [{local, remote}, ?MODULE, [], []]),
  792:     {reply, ok} = Async({remote, Remote}, started_p),
  793:     {error, {shutdown, _}} = Async({remote, Remote}, stop_shutdown),
  794:     {error, {noproc, _}} = Async({remote, Remote}, started_p),
  795: 
  796:     %% Cleanup
  797:     catch exit(Via, foo2),
  798:     receive {'EXIT', Via, foo2} -> ok end,
  799:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl),
  800:     ok.
  801: 
  802: send_request_receive_reqid_collection(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  803:     {ok, Pid1} = gen_server_copy:start_link({local, my_test_name1},
  804:                                        gen_server_copy_SUITE, [], []),
  805:     {ok, Pid2} = gen_server_copy:start_link({local, my_test_name2},
  806:                                        gen_server_copy_SUITE, [], []),
  807:     {ok, Pid3} = gen_server_copy:start_link({local, my_test_name3},
  808:                                        gen_server_copy_SUITE, [], []),
  809:     send_request_receive_reqid_collection(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3),
  810:     send_request_receive_reqid_collection_timeout(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3),
  811:     send_request_receive_reqid_collection_error(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3),
  812:     unlink(Pid1),
  813:     exit(Pid1, kill),
  814:     unlink(Pid2),
  815:     exit(Pid2, kill),
  816:     unlink(Pid3),
  817:     exit(Pid3, kill),
  818:     false = is_process_alive(Pid1),
  819:     false = is_process_alive(Pid2),
  820:     false = is_process_alive(Pid3),
  821:     ok.
  822: 
  823: send_request_receive_reqid_collection(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3) ->
  824: 
  825:     ReqId0 = gen_server_copy:send_request(Pid1, started_p),
  826: 
  827:     ReqIdC0 = gen_server_copy:reqids_new(),
  828: 
  829:     ReqId1 = gen_server_copy:send_request(Pid1, {delayed_answer,400}),
  830:     ReqIdC1 = gen_server_copy:reqids_add(ReqId1, req1, ReqIdC0),
  831:     1 = gen_server_copy:reqids_size(ReqIdC1),
  832: 
  833:     ReqIdC2 = gen_server_copy:send_request(Pid2, {delayed_answer,1}, req2, ReqIdC1),
  834:     2 = gen_server_copy:reqids_size(ReqIdC2),
  835: 
  836:     ReqIdC3 = gen_server_copy:send_request(Pid3, {delayed_answer,200}, req3, ReqIdC2),
  837:     3 = gen_server_copy:reqids_size(ReqIdC3),
  838:     
  839:     {{reply, delayed}, req2, ReqIdC4} = gen_server_copy:receive_response(ReqIdC3, infinity, true),
  840:     2 = gen_server_copy:reqids_size(ReqIdC4),
  841: 
  842:     {{reply, delayed}, req3, ReqIdC5} = gen_server_copy:receive_response(ReqIdC4, 5678, true),
  843:     1 = gen_server_copy:reqids_size(ReqIdC5),
  844: 
  845:     {{reply, delayed}, req1, ReqIdC6} = gen_server_copy:receive_response(ReqIdC5, 5000, true),
  846:     0 = gen_server_copy:reqids_size(ReqIdC6),
  847: 
  848:     no_request = gen_server_copy:receive_response(ReqIdC6, 5000, true),
  849: 
  850:     {reply, ok} = gen_server_copy:receive_response(ReqId0, infinity),
  851: 
  852:     ok.
  853: 
  854: send_request_receive_reqid_collection_timeout(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3) ->
  855: 
  856:     ReqId0 = gen_server_copy:send_request(Pid1, started_p),
  857: 
  858:     ReqIdC0 = gen_server_copy:reqids_new(),
  859: 
  860:     ReqId1 = gen_server_copy:send_request(Pid1, {delayed_answer,1000}),
  861:     ReqIdC1 = gen_server_copy:reqids_add(ReqId1, req1, ReqIdC0),
  862: 
  863:     ReqIdC2 = gen_server_copy:send_request(Pid2, {delayed_answer,1}, req2, ReqIdC1),
  864: 
  865:     ReqId3 = gen_server_copy:send_request(Pid3, {delayed_answer,500}),
  866:     ReqIdC3 = gen_server_copy:reqids_add(ReqId3, req3, ReqIdC2),
  867: 
  868:     Deadline = erlang:monotonic_time(millisecond) + 100,
  869:     
  870:     {{reply, delayed}, req2, ReqIdC4} = gen_server_copy:receive_response(ReqIdC3, {abs, Deadline}, true),
  871:     2 = gen_server_copy:reqids_size(ReqIdC4),
  872: 
  873:     timeout = gen_server_copy:receive_response(ReqIdC4, {abs, Deadline}, true),
  874: 
  875:     Abandoned = lists:sort([{ReqId1, req1}, {ReqId3, req3}]),
  876:     Abandoned = lists:sort(gen_server_copy:reqids_to_list(ReqIdC4)),
  877: 
  878:     %% Make sure requests were abandoned...
  879:     timeout = gen_server_copy:receive_response(ReqIdC4, {abs, Deadline+1000}, true),
  880: 
  881:     {reply, ok} = gen_server_copy:receive_response(ReqId0, infinity),
  882: 
  883:     ok.
  884:     
  885: send_request_receive_reqid_collection_error(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3) ->
  886: 
  887:     ReqId0 = gen_server_copy:send_request(Pid1, started_p),
  888: 
  889:     ReqIdC0 = gen_server_copy:reqids_new(),
  890: 
  891:     ReqId1 = gen_server_copy:send_request(Pid1, {delayed_answer,400}),
  892:     ReqIdC1 = gen_server_copy:reqids_add(ReqId1, req1, ReqIdC0),
  893:     try
  894:         nope = gen_server_copy:reqids_add(ReqId1, req2, ReqIdC1)
  895:     catch
  896:         error:badarg -> ok
  897:     end,
  898:  
  899:     unlink(Pid2),
  900:     ReqIdC2 = gen_server_copy:send_request(Pid2, stop_shutdown, req2, ReqIdC1),
  901:     ReqIdC3 = gen_server_copy:send_request(Pid3, {delayed_answer,200}, req3, ReqIdC2),
  902:     3 = gen_server_copy:reqids_size(ReqIdC3),
  903:     
  904:     {{error, {shutdown, _}}, req2, ReqIdC4} = gen_server_copy:receive_response(ReqIdC3, 2000, true),
  905:     2 = gen_server_copy:reqids_size(ReqIdC4),
  906: 
  907:     {{reply, delayed}, req3, ReqIdC4} = gen_server_copy:receive_response(ReqIdC4, infinity, false),
  908: 
  909:     {{reply, delayed}, req1, ReqIdC4} = gen_server_copy:receive_response(ReqIdC4, infinity, false),
  910: 
  911:     {reply, ok} = gen_server_copy:receive_response(ReqId0, infinity),
  912: 
  913:     ok.
  914: 
  915: send_request_wait_reqid_collection(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  916:     {ok, Pid1} = gen_server_copy:start_link({local, my_test_name1},
  917:                                        gen_server_copy_SUITE, [], []),
  918:     {ok, Pid2} = gen_server_copy:start_link({local, my_test_name2},
  919:                                        gen_server_copy_SUITE, [], []),
  920:     {ok, Pid3} = gen_server_copy:start_link({local, my_test_name3},
  921:                                        gen_server_copy_SUITE, [], []),
  922:     send_request_wait_reqid_collection(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3),
  923:     send_request_wait_reqid_collection_timeout(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3),
  924:     send_request_wait_reqid_collection_error(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3),
  925:     unlink(Pid1),
  926:     exit(Pid1, kill),
  927:     unlink(Pid2),
  928:     exit(Pid2, kill),
  929:     unlink(Pid3),
  930:     exit(Pid3, kill),
  931:     false = is_process_alive(Pid1),
  932:     false = is_process_alive(Pid2),
  933:     false = is_process_alive(Pid3),
  934:     ok.
  935: 
  936: send_request_wait_reqid_collection(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3) ->
  937: 
  938:     ReqId0 = gen_server_copy:send_request(Pid1, started_p),
  939: 
  940:     ReqIdC0 = gen_server_copy:reqids_new(),
  941: 
  942:     ReqId1 = gen_server_copy:send_request(Pid1, {delayed_answer,400}),
  943:     ReqIdC1 = gen_server_copy:reqids_add(ReqId1, req1, ReqIdC0),
  944:     1 = gen_server_copy:reqids_size(ReqIdC1),
  945: 
  946:     ReqIdC2 = gen_server_copy:send_request(Pid2, {delayed_answer,1}, req2, ReqIdC1),
  947:     2 = gen_server_copy:reqids_size(ReqIdC2),
  948: 
  949:     ReqIdC3 = gen_server_copy:send_request(Pid3, {delayed_answer,200}, req3, ReqIdC2),
  950:     3 = gen_server_copy:reqids_size(ReqIdC3),
  951:     
  952:     {{reply, delayed}, req2, ReqIdC4} = gen_server_copy:wait_response(ReqIdC3, infinity, true),
  953:     2 = gen_server_copy:reqids_size(ReqIdC4),
  954: 
  955:     {{reply, delayed}, req3, ReqIdC5} = gen_server_copy:wait_response(ReqIdC4, 5678, true),
  956:     1 = gen_server_copy:reqids_size(ReqIdC5),
  957: 
  958:     {{reply, delayed}, req1, ReqIdC6} = gen_server_copy:wait_response(ReqIdC5, 5000, true),
  959:     0 = gen_server_copy:reqids_size(ReqIdC6),
  960: 
  961:     no_request = gen_server_copy:wait_response(ReqIdC6, 5000, true),
  962: 
  963:     {reply, ok} = gen_server_copy:wait_response(ReqId0, infinity),
  964: 
  965:     ok.
  966: 
  967: send_request_wait_reqid_collection_timeout(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3) ->
  968: 
  969:     ReqId0 = gen_server_copy:send_request(Pid1, started_p),
  970: 
  971:     ReqIdC0 = gen_server_copy:reqids_new(),
  972: 
  973:     ReqId1 = gen_server_copy:send_request(Pid1, {delayed_answer,1000}),
  974:     ReqIdC1 = gen_server_copy:reqids_add(ReqId1, req1, ReqIdC0),
  975: 
  976:     ReqIdC2 = gen_server_copy:send_request(Pid2, {delayed_answer,1}, req2, ReqIdC1),
  977: 
  978:     ReqId3 = gen_server_copy:send_request(Pid3, {delayed_answer,500}),
  979:     ReqIdC3 = gen_server_copy:reqids_add(ReqId3, req3, ReqIdC2),
  980: 
  981:     Deadline = erlang:monotonic_time(millisecond) + 100,
  982:     
  983:     {{reply, delayed}, req2, ReqIdC4} = gen_server_copy:wait_response(ReqIdC3, {abs, Deadline}, true),
  984:     2 = gen_server_copy:reqids_size(ReqIdC4),
  985: 
  986:     timeout = gen_server_copy:wait_response(ReqIdC4, {abs, Deadline}, true),
  987: 
  988:     Unhandled = lists:sort([{ReqId1, req1}, {ReqId3, req3}]),
  989:     Unhandled = lists:sort(gen_server_copy:reqids_to_list(ReqIdC4)),
  990: 
  991:     %% Make sure requests were not abandoned...
  992:     {{reply, delayed}, req3, ReqIdC4} = gen_server_copy:wait_response(ReqIdC4, {abs, Deadline+1500}, false),
  993:     {{reply, delayed}, req1, ReqIdC4} = gen_server_copy:wait_response(ReqIdC4, {abs, Deadline+1500}, false),
  994: 
  995:     {reply, ok} = gen_server_copy:receive_response(ReqId0, infinity),
  996: 
  997:     ok.
  998:     
  999: send_request_wait_reqid_collection_error(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3) ->
 1000: 
 1001:     ReqId0 = gen_server_copy:send_request(Pid1, started_p),
 1002: 
 1003:     ReqIdC0 = gen_server_copy:reqids_new(),
 1004: 
 1005:     ReqId1 = gen_server_copy:send_request(Pid1, {delayed_answer,400}),
 1006:     ReqIdC1 = gen_server_copy:reqids_add(ReqId1, req1, ReqIdC0),
 1007:     try
 1008:         nope = gen_server_copy:reqids_add(ReqId1, req2, ReqIdC1)
 1009:     catch
 1010:         error:badarg -> ok
 1011:     end,
 1012:  
 1013:     unlink(Pid2),
 1014:     ReqIdC2 = gen_server_copy:send_request(Pid2, stop_shutdown, req2, ReqIdC1),
 1015:     ReqIdC3 = gen_server_copy:send_request(Pid3, {delayed_answer,200}, req3, ReqIdC2),
 1016:     3 = gen_server_copy:reqids_size(ReqIdC3),
 1017:     
 1018:     {{error, {shutdown, _}}, req2, ReqIdC4} = gen_server_copy:wait_response(ReqIdC3, 2000, true),
 1019:     2 = gen_server_copy:reqids_size(ReqIdC4),
 1020: 
 1021:     {{reply, delayed}, req3, ReqIdC4} = gen_server_copy:wait_response(ReqIdC4, infinity, false),
 1022: 
 1023:     {{reply, delayed}, req1, ReqIdC4} = gen_server_copy:wait_response(ReqIdC4, infinity, false),
 1024: 
 1025:     {reply, ok} = gen_server_copy:wait_response(ReqId0, infinity),
 1026: 
 1027:     ok.
 1028: 
 1029: send_request_check_reqid_collection(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1030:     {ok, Pid1} = gen_server_copy:start_link({local, my_test_name1},
 1031:                                        gen_server_copy_SUITE, [], []),
 1032:     {ok, Pid2} = gen_server_copy:start_link({local, my_test_name2},
 1033:                                        gen_server_copy_SUITE, [], []),
 1034:     {ok, Pid3} = gen_server_copy:start_link({local, my_test_name3},
 1035:                                        gen_server_copy_SUITE, [], []),
 1036:     send_request_check_reqid_collection(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3),
 1037:     send_request_check_reqid_collection_error(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3),
 1038:     unlink(Pid1),
 1039:     exit(Pid1, kill),
 1040:     unlink(Pid2),
 1041:     exit(Pid2, kill),
 1042:     unlink(Pid3),
 1043:     exit(Pid3, kill),
 1044:     false = is_process_alive(Pid1),
 1045:     false = is_process_alive(Pid2),
 1046:     false = is_process_alive(Pid3),
 1047:     ok.
 1048: 
 1049: send_request_check_reqid_collection(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3) ->
 1050: 
 1051:     ReqId0 = gen_server_copy:send_request(Pid1, started_p),
 1052: 
 1053:     receive after 100 -> ok end,
 1054: 
 1055:     ReqIdC0 = gen_server_copy:reqids_new(),
 1056: 
 1057:     ReqIdC1 = gen_server_copy:send_request(Pid1, {delayed_answer,400}, req1, ReqIdC0),
 1058:     1 = gen_server_copy:reqids_size(ReqIdC1),
 1059: 
 1060:     ReqId2 = gen_server_copy:send_request(Pid2, {delayed_answer,1}),
 1061:     ReqIdC2 = gen_server_copy:reqids_add(ReqId2, req2, ReqIdC1),
 1062:     2 = gen_server_copy:reqids_size(ReqIdC2),
 1063: 
 1064:     ReqIdC3 = gen_server_copy:send_request(Pid3, {delayed_answer,200}, req3, ReqIdC2),
 1065:     3 = gen_server_copy:reqids_size(ReqIdC3),
 1066: 
 1067:     Msg0 = next_msg(),
 1068:     no_reply = gen_server_copy:check_response(Msg0, ReqIdC3, true),
 1069:     
 1070:     {{reply, delayed}, req2, ReqIdC4} = gen_server_copy:check_response(next_msg(), ReqIdC3, true),
 1071:     2 = gen_server_copy:reqids_size(ReqIdC4),
 1072: 
 1073:     {{reply, delayed}, req3, ReqIdC5} = gen_server_copy:check_response(next_msg(), ReqIdC4, true),
 1074:     1 = gen_server_copy:reqids_size(ReqIdC5),
 1075: 
 1076:     {{reply, delayed}, req1, ReqIdC6} = gen_server_copy:check_response(next_msg(), ReqIdC5, true),
 1077:     0 = gen_server_copy:reqids_size(ReqIdC6),
 1078: 
 1079:     no_request = gen_server_copy:check_response(Msg0, ReqIdC6, true),
 1080: 
 1081:     {reply, ok} = gen_server_copy:check_response(Msg0, ReqId0),
 1082: 
 1083:     ok.
 1084:     
 1085: send_request_check_reqid_collection_error(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3) ->
 1086: 
 1087:     ReqId0 = gen_server_copy:send_request(Pid1, started_p),
 1088: 
 1089:     receive after 100 -> ok end,
 1090: 
 1091:     ReqIdC0 = gen_server_copy:reqids_new(),
 1092: 
 1093:     ReqId1 = gen_server_copy:send_request(Pid1, {delayed_answer,400}),
 1094:     ReqIdC1 = gen_server_copy:reqids_add(ReqId1, req1, ReqIdC0),
 1095: 
 1096:     unlink(Pid2),
 1097:     ReqIdC2 = gen_server_copy:send_request(Pid2, stop_shutdown, req2, ReqIdC1),
 1098: 
 1099:     ReqIdC3 = gen_server_copy:send_request(Pid3, {delayed_answer,200}, req3, ReqIdC2),
 1100:     3 = gen_server_copy:reqids_size(ReqIdC3),
 1101: 
 1102:     Msg0 = next_msg(),
 1103: 
 1104:     no_reply = gen_server_copy:check_response(Msg0, ReqIdC3, true),
 1105:     
 1106:     {{error, {shutdown, _}}, req2, ReqIdC4} = gen_server_copy:check_response(next_msg(), ReqIdC3, true),
 1107:     2 = gen_server_copy:reqids_size(ReqIdC4),
 1108: 
 1109:     {{reply, delayed}, req3, ReqIdC4} = gen_server_copy:check_response(next_msg(), ReqIdC4, false),
 1110: 
 1111:     {{reply, delayed}, req1, ReqIdC4} = gen_server_copy:check_response(next_msg(), ReqIdC4, false),
 1112: 
 1113:     {reply, ok} = gen_server_copy:check_response(Msg0, ReqId0),
 1114: 
 1115:     ok.
 1116: 
 1117: next_msg() ->
 1118:     receive M -> M end.
 1119: 
 1120: %% --------------------------------------
 1121: %% Test handle_continue.
 1122: %% --------------------------------------
 1123: 
 1124: continue(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1125:     {ok, Pid} = gen_server_copy:start_link(gen_server_copy_SUITE, {continue, self()}, []),
 1126:     [{Pid, continue}, {Pid, after_continue}] = read_replies(Pid),
 1127: 
 1128:     gen_server_copy:call(Pid, {continue_reply, self()}),
 1129:     [{Pid, continue}, {Pid, after_continue}] = read_replies(Pid),
 1130: 
 1131:     gen_server_copy:call(Pid, {continue_noreply, self()}),
 1132:     [{Pid, continue}, {Pid, after_continue}] = read_replies(Pid),
 1133: 
 1134:     gen_server_copy:cast(Pid, {continue_noreply, self()}),
 1135:     [{Pid, continue}, {Pid, after_continue}] = read_replies(Pid),
 1136: 
 1137:     Pid ! {continue_noreply, self()},
 1138:     [{Pid, continue}, {Pid, after_continue}] = read_replies(Pid),
 1139: 
 1140:     Pid ! {continue_continue, self()},
 1141:     [{Pid, before_continue}, {Pid, continue}, {Pid, after_continue}] = read_replies(Pid),
 1142: 
 1143:     Ref = monitor(process, Pid),
 1144:     Pid ! continue_stop,
 1145:     verify_down_reason(Ref, Pid, normal).
 1146: 
 1147: read_replies(Pid) ->
 1148:     receive
 1149: 	{Pid, ack} -> read_replies()
 1150:     after
 1151: 	1000 -> ct:fail({continue, ack})
 1152:     end.
 1153: 
 1154: read_replies() ->
 1155:     receive
 1156: 	Msg -> [Msg | read_replies()]
 1157:     after
 1158: 	0 -> []
 1159:     end.
 1160: 
 1161: %% --------------------------------------
 1162: %% Test call to nonexisting processes on remote nodes
 1163: %% --------------------------------------
 1164: 
 1165: call_remote1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1166:     N = hubba,
 1167:     Node = proplists:get_value(node,Config),
 1168:     {ok, Pid} = rpc:call(Node, gen_server_copy, start,
 1169: 			 [{global, N}, ?MODULE, [], []]),
 1170:     ok = (catch gen_server_copy:call({global, N}, started_p, infinity)),
 1171:     exit(Pid, boom),
 1172:     {'EXIT', {Reason, _}} = (catch gen_server_copy:call({global, N},
 1173: 						   started_p, infinity)),
 1174:     true = (Reason == noproc) orelse (Reason == boom),
 1175:     ok.
 1176: 
 1177: call_remote2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1178:     N = hubba,
 1179:     Node = proplists:get_value(node,Config),
 1180: 
 1181:     {ok, Pid} = rpc:call(Node, gen_server_copy, start,
 1182: 			 [{global, N}, ?MODULE, [], []]),
 1183:     ok = (catch gen_server_copy:call(Pid, started_p, infinity)),
 1184:     exit(Pid, boom),
 1185:     {'EXIT', {Reason, _}} = (catch gen_server_copy:call(Pid,
 1186: 						   started_p, infinity)),
 1187:     true = (Reason == noproc) orelse (Reason == boom),
 1188:     ok.
 1189: 
 1190: call_remote3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1191:     Node = proplists:get_value(node,Config),
 1192: 
 1193:     {ok, Pid} = rpc:call(Node, gen_server_copy, start,
 1194: 			 [{local, piller}, ?MODULE, [], []]),
 1195:     ok = (catch gen_server_copy:call({piller, Node}, started_p, infinity)),
 1196:     exit(Pid, boom),
 1197:     {'EXIT', {Reason, _}} = (catch gen_server_copy:call({piller, Node},
 1198: 						   started_p, infinity)),
 1199:     true = (Reason == noproc) orelse (Reason == boom),
 1200:     ok.
 1201:

 1203: %% Test call to nonexisting node
 1204: %% --------------------------------------

 1206: call_remote_n1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1207:     N = hubba,
 1208:     Node = proplists:get_value(node,Config),
 1209:     {ok, _Pid} = rpc:call(Node, gen_server_copy, start,
 1210: 			  [{global, N}, ?MODULE, [], []]),
 1211:     peer:stop(proplists:get_value(peer,Config)),
 1212:     {'EXIT', {noproc, _}} =
 1213: 	(catch gen_server_copy:call({global, N}, started_p, infinity)),
 1214: 
 1215:     ok.
 1216: 
 1217: call_remote_n2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1218:     N = hubba,
 1219:     Node = proplists:get_value(node,Config),
 1220: 
 1221:     {ok, Pid} = rpc:call(Node, gen_server_copy, start,
 1222: 			 [{global, N}, ?MODULE, [], []]),
 1223:     peer:stop(proplists:get_value(peer,Config)),
 1224:     {'EXIT', {{nodedown, Node}, _}} = (catch gen_server_copy:call(Pid,
 1225: 							     started_p, infinity)),
 1226: 
 1227:     ok.
 1228: 
 1229: call_remote_n3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1230:     Node = proplists:get_value(node,Config),
 1231: 
 1232:     {ok, _Pid} = rpc:call(Node, gen_server_copy, start,
 1233: 			  [{local, piller}, ?MODULE, [], []]),
 1234:     peer:stop(proplists:get_value(peer,Config)),
 1235:     {'EXIT', {{nodedown, Node}, _}} = (catch gen_server_copy:call({piller, Node},
 1236: 							     started_p, infinity)),
 1237:

 1241: %% Other bad calls
 1242: %% --------------------------------------

 1244: calling_self(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1245:     {'EXIT', {calling_self, _}} = (catch gen_server_copy:call(self(), oops)),
 1246:     {'EXIT', {calling_self, _}} = (catch gen_server_copy:call(self(), oops, infinity)),
 1247:     ok.
