 1249: %% --------------------------------------
 1250: %% Test gen_server_copy:cast and handle_cast.
 1251: %% Test all different return values from
 1252: %% handle_cast.
 1253: %% --------------------------------------
 1254: 
 1255: cast(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1256:     {ok, Pid} =
 1257: 	gen_server_copy:start({local, my_test_name},
 1258: 			 gen_server_copy_SUITE, [], []),
 1259: 
 1260:     ok = gen_server_copy:call(my_test_name, started_p),
 1261: 
 1262:     ok = gen_server_copy:cast(my_test_name, {self(),handle_cast}),
 1263:     receive
 1264: 	{Pid, handled_cast} ->
 1265: 	    ok
 1266:     after 1000 ->
 1267: 	    ct:fail(handle_cast)
 1268:     end,
 1269: 
 1270:     ok = gen_server_copy:cast(my_test_name, {self(),delayed_cast,1}),
 1271:     receive
 1272: 	{Pid, delayed} ->
 1273: 	    ok
 1274:     after 1000 ->
 1275: 	    ct:fail(delayed_cast)
 1276:     end,
 1277: 
 1278:     ok = gen_server_copy:cast(my_test_name, {self(),stop}),
 1279:     receive
 1280: 	{Pid, stopped} ->
 1281: 	    ok
 1282:     after 1000 ->
 1283: 	    ct:fail(stop)
 1284:     end,
 1285:     ok.
 1286: 
 1287: %% Test that cast really return immediately.
 1288: cast_fast(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1289:     {ok,Peer,Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 1290:     %% After starting a slave, it takes a little while until global knows
 1291:     %% about it, even if nodes() includes it, so we make sure that global
 1292:     %% knows about it before registering something on all nodes.
 1293:     ok = global:sync(),
 1294:     {_,"@"++Host} = lists:splitwith(fun ($@) -> false; (_) -> true end,
 1295: 				    atom_to_list(Node)),
 1296:     FalseNode = list_to_atom("hopp@"++Host),
 1297:     true = rpc:cast(Node, ?MODULE, cast_fast_messup, []),
 1298:     ct:sleep(1000),
 1299:     [Node] = nodes(),
 1300:     {Time,ok} = timer:tc(fun() ->
 1301: 				 gen_server_copy:cast({hopp,FalseNode}, hopp)
 1302: 			 end),
 1303:     peer:stop(Peer),
 1304:     if Time > 1000000 ->       % Default listen timeout is about 7.0 s
 1305: 	    ct:fail(hanging_cast);
 1306:        true ->
 1307: 	    ok
 1308:     end.
 1309: 
 1310: cast_fast_messup() ->
 1311:     %% Register a false node: hopp@hostname
 1312:     unregister(erl_epmd),
 1313:     {ok, _} = erl_epmd:start_link(),
 1314:     {ok,S} = gen_tcp:listen(0, []),
 1315:     {ok,P} = inet:port(S),
 1316:     {ok,_Creation} = erl_epmd:register_node(hopp, P),
 1317:     receive after infinity -> ok end.
 1318: 
 1319: %% --------------------------------------
 1320: %% Test handle_info.
 1321: %% --------------------------------------
 1322: 
 1323: info(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1324:     {ok, Pid} =
 1325: 	gen_server_copy:start({local, my_test_name},
 1326: 			 gen_server_copy_SUITE, [], []),
 1327: 
 1328:     ok = gen_server_copy:call(my_test_name, started_p),
 1329: 
 1330:     Pid ! {self(),handle_info},
 1331:     receive
 1332: 	{Pid, handled_info} ->
 1333: 	    ok
 1334:     after 1000 ->
 1335: 	    ct:fail(handle_info)
 1336:     end,
 1337: 
 1338:     Pid ! {self(),delayed_info,1},
 1339:     receive
 1340: 	{Pid, delayed_info} ->
 1341: 	    ok
 1342:     after 1000 ->
 1343: 	    ct:fail(delayed_info)
 1344:     end,
 1345: 
 1346:     Pid ! {self(),stop},
 1347:     receive
 1348: 	{Pid, stopped_info} ->
 1349: 	    ok
 1350:     after 1000 ->
 1351: 	    ct:fail(stop_info)
 1352:     end,
 1353:     ok.
 1354: 
 1355: handle_event_timeout(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1356:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1357: 
 1358:     {ok, Pid} =
 1359:         gen_server_copy:start(gen_server_copy_SUITE, [], []),
 1360:     pong = gen_server_copy:call(Pid, ping),
 1361: 
 1362:     T = 100,
 1363: 
 1364:     lists:foreach(
 1365: 	fun({Cmd, Arg, Interrupt}) ->
 1366: 	    Cmd(Pid, Arg),
 1367: 	    sys:get_status(Pid),
 1368: 	    case element(1, Arg) of
 1369: 		timeout ->
 1370: 		    is_not_hibernated(Pid);
 1371: 		continue_timeout ->
 1372: 		    is_not_hibernated(Pid);
 1373: 		hibernate ->
 1374: 		    is_hibernated(Pid);
 1375: 		continue_hibernate ->
 1376: 		    is_hibernated(Pid)
 1377: 	    end,
 1378: 	    case Interrupt of
 1379: 		true ->
 1380: 		    pong = gen_server_copy:call(Pid, ping);
 1381: 		false ->
 1382: 		    ok
 1383: 	    end,
 1384: 	    receive
 1385: 		{Pid, event_timeout} ->
 1386: 		    not Interrupt orelse ct:fail(event_timeout_message_received)
 1387: 	    after T bsl 1 ->
 1388: 		Interrupt orelse ct:fail(event_timeout_message_not_received)
 1389: 	    end,
 1390: 	    is_not_hibernated(Pid)
 1391: 	end,
 1392: 	[{Cmd, Arg, Interrupt} || Cmd <- [fun gen_server_copy:call/2,
 1393: 					  fun gen_server_copy:cast/2,
 1394: 					  fun erlang:send/2],
 1395: 				  Arg <- [{timeout, T, self()},
 1396: 					  {timeout, T, self(), relative},
 1397: 					  {timeout, T, self(), absolute},
 1398: 					  {continue_timeout, T, self()},
 1399: 					  {continue_timeout, T, self(), relative},
 1400: 					  {continue_timeout, T, self(), absolute},
 1401: 					  {hibernate, T, self()},
 1402: 					  {hibernate, T, self(), relative},
 1403: 					  {hibernate, T, self(), absolute},
 1404: 					  {continue_hibernate, T, self()},
 1405: 					  {continue_hibernate, T, self(), relative},
 1406: 					  {continue_hibernate, T, self(), absolute}],
 1407: 				  Interrupt <- [false, true]]),
 1408:     ok = gen_server_copy:call(Pid, stop),
 1409:     busy_wait_for_process(Pid, T + (T bsr 1)),
 1410:     {'EXIT', {noproc, _}} = (catch gen_server_copy:call(Pid, started_p, 1)),
 1411: 
 1412:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl),
 1413:     ok.
 1414: 
 1415: handle_event_timeout_infinity(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1416:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1417: 
 1418:     {ok, Pid} =
 1419:         gen_server_copy:start(gen_server_copy_SUITE, [], []),
 1420:     pong = gen_server_copy:call(Pid, ping),
 1421: 
 1422:     T = 100,
 1423: 
 1424:     lists:foreach(
 1425:       fun({Cmd, Arg}) ->
 1426:               Cmd(Pid, Arg),
 1427:               sys:get_status(Pid),
 1428:               case element(1, Arg) of
 1429:                   timeout ->
 1430:                       is_not_hibernated(Pid);
 1431:                   continue_timeout ->
 1432:                       is_not_hibernated(Pid);
 1433:                   hibernate ->
 1434:                       is_hibernated(Pid);
 1435:                   continue_hibernate ->
 1436:                       is_hibernated(Pid)
 1437:               end,
 1438:               pong = gen_server_copy:call(Pid, ping),
 1439:               receive
 1440:                   {Pid, event_timeout} ->
 1441:                       ct:fail(event_timeout_message_received)
 1442:               after T bsl 1 ->
 1443:                       ok
 1444:               end,
 1445:               is_not_hibernated(Pid)
 1446:       end,
 1447:       [{Cmd, Arg} ||
 1448:           Cmd <- [fun gen_server_copy:call/2,
 1449:                   fun gen_server_copy:cast/2,
 1450:                   fun erlang:send/2],
 1451:           Arg <- [{timeout, infinity, self()},
 1452:                   {timeout, infinity, self(), relative},
 1453:                   {timeout, infinity, self(), absolute},
 1454:                   {continue_timeout, infinity, self()},
 1455:                   {continue_timeout, infinity, self(), relative},
 1456:                   {continue_timeout, infinity, self(), absolute},
 1457:                   {hibernate, infinity, self()},
 1458:                   {hibernate, infinity, self(), relative},
 1459:                   {hibernate, infinity, self(), absolute},
 1460:                   {continue_hibernate, infinity, self()},
 1461:                   {continue_hibernate, infinity, self(), relative},
 1462:                   {continue_hibernate, infinity, self(), absolute}]]),
 1463:     ok = gen_server_copy:call(Pid, stop),
 1464:     busy_wait_for_process(Pid, T + (T bsr 1)),
 1465:     {'EXIT', {noproc, _}} = (catch gen_server_copy:call(Pid, started_p, 1)),
 1466: 
 1467:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl),
 1468:     ok.
 1469: 
 1470: handle_event_timeout_zero(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1471:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1472: 
 1473:     {ok, Pid} =
 1474:         gen_server_copy:start(gen_server_copy_SUITE, [], []),
 1475:     pong = gen_server_copy:call(Pid, ping),
 1476: 
 1477:     T = 100,
 1478: 
 1479:     lists:foreach(
 1480: 	fun({Cmd, Arg}) ->
 1481: 	    Cmd(Pid, Arg),
 1482: 	    receive
 1483: 		{Pid, after_event_timeout_zero} ->
 1484: 		    ct:fail(after_event_timeout_zero_message_received);
 1485: 		{Pid, event_timeout} ->
 1486: 		    ok
 1487: 	    after T bsl 1 ->
 1488: 		ct:fail(event_timeout_message_not_received)
 1489: 	    end,
 1490: 	    receive
 1491: 		{Pid, after_event_timeout_zero} ->
 1492: 		    ok
 1493: 	    after T bsl 1 ->
 1494: 		ct:fail(after_event_timeout_zero_message_not_received)
 1495: 	    end
 1496: 	end,
 1497: 	[{Cmd, Arg} || Cmd <- [fun gen_server_copy:call/2,
 1498: 			       fun gen_server_copy:cast/2,
 1499: 			       fun erlang:send/2],
 1500: 		       Arg <- [{timeout_zero, self()},
 1501: 			       {continue_timeout_zero, self()},
 1502: 			       {hibernate_zero, self()},
 1503: 			       {continue_hibernate_zero, self()}]]),
 1504:     ok = gen_server_copy:call(Pid, stop),
 1505:     busy_wait_for_process(Pid, T + (T bsr 1)),
 1506:     {'EXIT', {noproc, _}} = (catch gen_server_copy:call(Pid, started_p, 1)),
 1507: 
 1508:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl),
 1509:     ok.
 1510: 
 1511: handle_event_timeout_plain(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1512:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1513: 
 1514:     {ok, Pid} =
 1515:         gen_server_copy:start(gen_server_copy_SUITE, [], []),
 1516:     pong = gen_server_copy:call(Pid, ping),
 1517: 
 1518:     T = 100,
 1519: 
 1520:     %% a `system` message should not cancel a plain timeout
 1521:     ok = gen_server_copy:cast(Pid, {self(), delayed_cast, T}),
 1522:     sys:get_status(Pid),
 1523:     receive
 1524: 	{Pid, delayed} ->
 1525: 	    ok
 1526:     after T bsl 1 ->
 1527: 	ct:fail(delayed_cast_message_not_received)
 1528:     end,
 1529: 
 1530:     %% a request (or other message) should cancel a plain timeout
 1531:     ok = gen_server_copy:cast(Pid, {self(), delayed_cast, T}),
 1532:     pong = gen_server_copy:call(Pid, ping),
 1533:     receive
 1534: 	{Pid, delayed} ->
 1535: 	    ct:fail(delayed_cast_message_received)
 1536:     after T bsl 1 ->
 1537: 	ok
 1538:     end,
 1539: 
 1540:     ok = gen_server_copy:call(Pid, stop),
 1541:     busy_wait_for_process(Pid, T + (T bsr 1)),
 1542:     {'EXIT', {noproc, _}} = (catch gen_server_copy:call(Pid, started_p, 1)),
 1543: 
 1544:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl),
 1545:     ok.
 1546: 
 1547: hibernate(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1548:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1549:     {ok, Pid0} =
 1550: 	gen_server_copy:start_link({local, my_test_name_hibernate0},
 1551: 			      gen_server_copy_SUITE, hibernate, []),
 1552:     is_hibernated(Pid0),
 1553:     ok = gen_server_copy:call(my_test_name_hibernate0, stop),
 1554:     receive 
 1555: 	{'EXIT', Pid0, stopped} ->
 1556:  	    ok
 1557:     after 5000 ->
 1558: 	    ct:fail(gen_server_copy_did_not_die)
 1559:     end,
 1560: 
 1561:     {ok, Pid} =
 1562: 	gen_server_copy:start_link({local, my_test_name_hibernate},
 1563: 			      gen_server_copy_SUITE, [], []),
 1564: 
 1565:     ok = gen_server_copy:call(my_test_name_hibernate, started_p),
 1566:     true = gen_server_copy:call(my_test_name_hibernate, hibernate),
 1567:     is_hibernated(Pid),
 1568:     Parent = self(),
 1569:     Fun = fun() ->
 1570: 		  receive go -> ok end,
 1571: 		  receive after 1000 -> ok end,
 1572: 		  X = erlang:process_info(Pid, current_function),
 1573:  		  Pid ! continue,
 1574:  		  Parent ! {result,X}
 1575:  	  end,
 1576:     Pid2 = spawn_link(Fun),
 1577:     true = gen_server_copy:call(my_test_name_hibernate, {hibernate_noreply,Pid2}),
 1578: 
 1579:     gen_server_copy:cast(my_test_name_hibernate, hibernate_later),
 1580:     true = ({current_function,{gen_server_copy, loop_hibernate, 4}} =/=
 1581: 		erlang:process_info(Pid, current_function)),
 1582:     is_hibernated(Pid),
 1583:     ok = gen_server_copy:call(my_test_name_hibernate, started_p),
 1584:     true = ({current_function,{gen_server_copy, loop_hibernate, 4}} =/=
 1585: 		erlang:process_info(Pid, current_function)),
 1586: 
 1587:     gen_server_copy:cast(my_test_name_hibernate, hibernate_now),
 1588:     is_hibernated(Pid),
 1589:     ok = gen_server_copy:call(my_test_name_hibernate, started_p),
 1590:     true = ({current_function,{gen_server_copy, loop_hibernate, 4}} =/=
 1591: 		erlang:process_info(Pid, current_function)),
 1592: 
 1593:     Pid ! hibernate_later,
 1594:     true = ({current_function,{gen_server_copy, loop_hibernate, 4}} =/=
 1595: 		erlang:process_info(Pid, current_function)),
 1596:     is_hibernated(Pid),
 1597:     ok = gen_server_copy:call(my_test_name_hibernate, started_p),
 1598:     true = ({current_function,{gen_server_copy, loop_hibernate, 4}} =/=
 1599: 		erlang:process_info(Pid, current_function)),
 1600: 
 1601:     Pid ! hibernate_now,
 1602:     is_hibernated(Pid),
 1603:     ok = gen_server_copy:call(my_test_name_hibernate, started_p),
 1604:     true = ({current_function,{gen_server_copy, loop_hibernate, 4}} =/=
 1605: 		erlang:process_info(Pid, current_function)),
 1606:     receive
 1607: 	{result,R} ->
 1608: 	    {current_function,{gen_server_copy, loop_hibernate, 4}} = R
 1609:     end,
 1610: 
 1611:     true = gen_server_copy:call(my_test_name_hibernate, hibernate),
 1612:     is_hibernated(Pid),
 1613:     sys:suspend(my_test_name_hibernate),
 1614:     is_hibernated(Pid),
 1615:     sys:resume(my_test_name_hibernate),
 1616:     is_hibernated(Pid),
 1617:     ok = gen_server_copy:call(my_test_name_hibernate, started_p),
 1618:     true = ({current_function,{gen_server_copy, loop_hibernate, 4}} =/= erlang:process_info(Pid,current_function)),
 1619: 
 1620:     ok = gen_server_copy:call(my_test_name_hibernate, stop),
 1621:     receive 
 1622: 	{'EXIT', Pid, stopped} ->
 1623:  	    ok
 1624:     after 5000 ->
 1625: 	    ct:fail(gen_server_copy_did_not_die)
 1626:     end,
 1627:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl),
 1628:     ok.
 1629: 
 1630: auto_hibernate(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1631:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1632:     HibernateAfterTimeout = 100,
 1633:     State = {auto_hibernate_state},
 1634:     {ok, Pid} =
 1635:         gen_server_copy:start_link({local, my_test_name_auto_hibernate},
 1636:             gen_server_copy_SUITE, {state,State}, [{hibernate_after, HibernateAfterTimeout}]),
 1637:     %% After init test
 1638:     is_not_hibernated(Pid),
 1639:     timer:sleep(HibernateAfterTimeout),
 1640:     is_hibernated(Pid),
 1641:     %% Get state test
 1642:     State = sys:get_state(my_test_name_auto_hibernate),
 1643:     is_hibernated(Pid),
 1644:     %% Call test
 1645:     ok = gen_server_copy:call(my_test_name_auto_hibernate, started_p),
 1646:     is_not_hibernated(Pid),
 1647:     timer:sleep(HibernateAfterTimeout),
 1648:     is_hibernated(Pid),
 1649:     %% Cast test
 1650:     ok = gen_server_copy:cast(my_test_name_auto_hibernate, {self(),handle_cast}),
 1651:     receive
 1652:         {Pid, handled_cast} ->
 1653:             ok
 1654:     after 1000 ->
 1655:         ct:fail(cast)
 1656:     end,
 1657:     is_not_hibernated(Pid),
 1658:     timer:sleep(HibernateAfterTimeout),
 1659:     is_hibernated(Pid),
 1660:     %% Info test
 1661:     Pid ! {self(),handle_info},
 1662:     receive
 1663:         {Pid, handled_info} ->
 1664:             ok
 1665:     after 1000 ->
 1666:         ct:fail(info)
 1667:     end,
 1668:     is_not_hibernated(Pid),
 1669:     timer:sleep(HibernateAfterTimeout),
 1670:     is_hibernated(Pid),
 1671: 
 1672:     ok = gen_server_copy:call(my_test_name_auto_hibernate, stop),
 1673:     receive
 1674:         {'EXIT', Pid, stopped} ->
 1675:             ok
 1676:     after 5000 ->
 1677:         ct:fail(gen_server_copy_did_not_die)
 1678:     end,
 1679:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl),
 1680:     ok.
 1681: 
 1682: is_hibernated(Pid) ->
 1683:     receive after 1 -> ok end,
 1684:     is_hibernated_1(200, Pid).
 1685: 
 1686: is_hibernated_1(0, Pid) ->
 1687:     io:format("~p\n", [erlang:process_info(Pid, current_function)]),
 1688:     ct:fail(is_not_hibernated);
 1689: is_hibernated_1(N, Pid) ->
 1690:     {current_function,MFA} = erlang:process_info(Pid, current_function),
 1691:     case MFA of
 1692: 	{gen_server_copy, loop_hibernate, 4} ->
 1693: 	    ok;
 1694: 	{erlang,hibernate,3} ->
 1695: 	    ok;
 1696: 	_ ->
 1697: 	    receive after 10 -> ok end,
 1698: 	    is_hibernated_1(N-1, Pid)
 1699:     end.
 1700: 
 1701: is_not_hibernated(Pid) ->
 1702:     receive after 1 -> ok end,
 1703:     is_not_hibernated_1(200, Pid).
 1704: 
 1705: is_not_hibernated_1(0, Pid) ->
 1706:     io:format("~p\n", [erlang:process_info(Pid, current_function)]),
 1707:     ct:fail(is_hibernated);
 1708: is_not_hibernated_1(N, Pid) ->
 1709:     {current_function,MFA} = erlang:process_info(Pid, current_function),
 1710:     case MFA of
 1711:         {gen_server_copy, loop_hibernate, 4} ->
 1712:             receive after 10 -> ok end,
 1713:             is_not_hibernated_1(N-1, Pid);
 1714:         {erlang,hibernate,3} ->
 1715:             receive after 10 -> ok end,
 1716:             is_not_hibernated_1(N-1, Pid);
 1717:         _ ->
 1718:             ok
 1719:     end.
 1720: 
 1721: %% --------------------------------------
 1722: %% Test gen_server_copy:abcast and handle_cast.
 1723: %% Test all different return values from
 1724: %% handle_cast.
 1725: %% --------------------------------------
 1726: 
 1727: abcast(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1728:     {ok, Pid} =
 1729: 	gen_server_copy:start({local, my_test_name},
 1730: 			 gen_server_copy_SUITE, [], []),
 1731: 
 1732:     ok = gen_server_copy:call(my_test_name, started_p),
 1733: 
 1734:     abcast = gen_server_copy:abcast(my_test_name, {self(),handle_cast}),
 1735:     receive
 1736: 	{Pid, handled_cast} ->
 1737: 	    ok
 1738:     after 1000 ->
 1739: 	    ct:fail(abcast)
 1740:     end,
 1741: 
 1742:     abcast = gen_server_copy:abcast([node()], my_test_name,
 1743: 			       {self(),delayed_cast,1}),
 1744:     receive
 1745: 	{Pid, delayed} ->
 1746: 	    ok
 1747:     after 1000 ->
 1748: 	    ct:fail(delayed_abcast)
 1749:     end,
 1750: 
 1751:     abcast = gen_server_copy:abcast(my_test_name, {self(),stop}),
 1752:     receive
 1753: 	{Pid, stopped} ->
 1754: 	    ok
 1755:     after 1000 ->
 1756: 	    ct:fail(abcast_stop)
 1757:     end,
 1758:     ok.
 1759: 
 1760: %% --------------------------------------
 1761: %% Test gen_server_copy:multicall and handle_call.
 1762: %% Test all different return values from
 1763: %% handle_call.
 1764: %% --------------------------------------
 1765: 
 1766: multicall(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1767:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1768: 
 1769:     {ok, Pid} =
 1770: 	gen_server_copy:start_link({local, my_test_name},
 1771: 			      gen_server_copy_SUITE, [], []),
 1772: 
 1773:     ok = gen_server_copy:call(my_test_name, started_p),
 1774:     Nodes = nodes(),
 1775:     Node = node(),
 1776:     {[{Node,delayed}],Nodes} =
 1777: 	gen_server_copy:multi_call(my_test_name, {delayed_answer,1}),
 1778: 
 1779:     %% two requests within a specified time.
 1780:     {[{Node,ok}],[]} =
 1781: 	gen_server_copy:multi_call([Node], my_test_name, {call_within, 1000}),
 1782:     timer:sleep(500),
 1783:     {[{Node,ok}],[]} =
 1784: 	gen_server_copy:multi_call([Node], my_test_name, next_call),
 1785:     {[{Node,ok}],[]} =
 1786: 	gen_server_copy:multi_call([Node], my_test_name, {call_within, 1000}),
 1787:     timer:sleep(1500),
 1788:     {[{Node,false}],[]} =
 1789: 	gen_server_copy:multi_call([Node],my_test_name, next_call),
 1790: 
 1791:     %% Stop the server.
 1792:     {[{Node,ok}],[]} =
 1793: 	gen_server_copy:multi_call([Node],my_test_name, stop),
 1794:     receive
 1795: 	{'EXIT', Pid, stopped} -> ok
 1796:     after 1000 ->
 1797: 	    ct:fail(multicall_stop)
 1798:     end,
 1799: 
 1800:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl),
 1801: 
 1802:     ok.
 1803: 
 1804: %% OTP-3587
 1805: multicall_down(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1806:     %% We need a named host which is inaccessible.
 1807:     Name = node@test01,
 1808: 
 1809:     %% We use 'global' as a gen_server_copy to call.
 1810:     {Good, Bad} = gen_server_copy:multi_call([Name, node()],
 1811: 					global_name_server,
 1812: 					info,
 1813: 					3000),
 1814:     io:format("good = ~p, bad = ~p~n", [Good, Bad]),
 1815:     [Name] = Bad,
 1816:     ok.
 1817: 
 1818: busy_wait_for_process(Pid,N) ->
 1819:     case erlang:is_process_alive(Pid) of
 1820: 	true ->
 1821: 	    receive
 1822: 	    after 100 ->
 1823: 		    ok
 1824: 	    end,
 1825: 	    busy_wait_for_process(Pid,N-1);
 1826: 	_ ->
 1827: 	    ok
 1828:     end.
 1829: 
 1830: multicall_remote(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1831:     PNs = lists:map(fun (_) ->
 1832:                             {ok, P, N} = ?CT_PEER(),
 1833:                             {P, N}
 1834:                     end, lists:seq(1, 4)),
 1835:     multicall_remote_test(PNs, ?FUNCTION_NAME),
 1836:     ok.
 1837: 
 1838: multicall_remote_old1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1839:     multicall_remote_old_test(Config, 1, ?FUNCTION_NAME).
 1840: 
 1841: multicall_remote_old2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1842:     multicall_remote_old_test(Config, 2, ?FUNCTION_NAME).
 1843: 
 1844: 
 1845: multicall_remote_old_test(Config, OldN, Name) ->
 1846:     try
 1847:         {OldRelName, OldRel} = old_release(OldN),
 1848:         PD = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 1849:         PNs = lists:map(fun (I) ->
 1850:                                 Dir = atom_to_list(Name)++"-"++integer_to_list(I),
 1851:                                 AbsDir = filename:join([PD, Dir]),
 1852:                                 ok = file:make_dir(AbsDir),
 1853:                                 case ?CT_PEER_REL(#{connection => 0}, OldRelName, AbsDir) of
 1854:                                     not_available ->
 1855:                                         throw({skipped, "No OTP "++OldRel++" available"});
 1856:                                     {ok, P, N} ->
 1857:                                         {P, N}
 1858:                                 end
 1859:                         end, lists:seq(1, 4)),
 1860:         OldNodes = lists:map(fun ({_, N}) -> N end, PNs),
 1861:         %% Recompile on one old node and load this on all old nodes...
 1862:         SrcFile = filename:rootname(code:which(?MODULE)) ++ ".erl",
 1863:         {ok, ?MODULE, BeamCode} = erpc:call(hd(OldNodes), compile, file, [SrcFile, [binary]]),
 1864:         LoadResult = lists:duplicate(length(OldNodes), {ok, {module, ?MODULE}}),
 1865:         LoadResult = erpc:multicall(OldNodes, code, load_binary, [?MODULE, SrcFile, BeamCode]),
 1866:         multicall_remote_test(PNs, Name)
 1867:     catch
 1868:         throw:Res ->
 1869:             Res
 1870:     end.
 1871: 
 1872: multicall_remote_test([{Peer1, Node1},
 1873:                        {Peer2, Node2},
 1874:                        {Peer3, Node3},
 1875:                        {Peer4, Node4}],
 1876:                       Name) ->
 1877:     Tester = self(),
 1878:     ThisNode = node(),
 1879: 
 1880:     Nodes = [Node1, Node2, Node3, Node4, ThisNode],
 1881: 
 1882:     SrvList =
 1883:         lists:map(fun (Node) ->
 1884:                           Ctrl = spawn_link(Node, ?MODULE,
 1885:                                             multicall_srv_ctrlr,
 1886:                                             [Tester, Name]),
 1887:                           receive
 1888:                               {Ctrl, _Srv} = Procs ->
 1889:                                   {Node, Procs}
 1890:                           end
 1891:                   end, Nodes),
 1892:     SrvMap = maps:from_list(SrvList),
 1893: 
 1894:     Res0 = {lists:map(fun (Node) ->
 1895:                               {Node,ok}
 1896:                       end, Nodes), []},
 1897: 
 1898:     Res0 = gen_server_copy:multi_call(Nodes, Name, started_p),
 1899: 
 1900:     true = try
 1901:                _ = gen_server_copy:multi_call([Node1, Node2, Node3, node(), {Node4}],
 1902:                                          Name, {delayed_answer,1}),
 1903:                false
 1904:            catch
 1905:                _:_ ->
 1906:                    true
 1907:            end,
 1908: 
 1909:     Res1 = {lists:map(fun (Node) ->
 1910:                               {Node,delayed}
 1911:                       end, Nodes), []},
 1912: 
 1913:     Res1 = gen_server_copy:multi_call(Nodes, Name, {delayed_answer,1}),
 1914: 
 1915:     Res2 = {[], Nodes},
 1916: 
 1917:     Start = erlang:monotonic_time(millisecond),
 1918:     Res2 = gen_server_copy:multi_call(Nodes, Name, {delayed_answer,1000}, 100),
 1919:     End = erlang:monotonic_time(millisecond),
 1920:     Time = End-Start,
 1921:     ct:log("Time: ~p ms~n", [Time]),
 1922:     true = 200 >= Time,
 1923: 
 1924:     {Ctrl2, Srv2} = maps:get(Node2, SrvMap),
 1925:     unlink(Ctrl2),
 1926:     exit(Ctrl2, kill),
 1927:     wait_until(fun () ->
 1928:                        false == erpc:call(Node2, erlang,
 1929:                                           is_process_alive, [Srv2])
 1930:                end),
 1931: 
 1932:     {Ctrl3, _Srv3} = maps:get(Node3, SrvMap),
 1933:     unlink(Ctrl3),
 1934:     peer:stop(Peer3),
 1935: 
 1936:     {Ctrl4, Srv4} = maps:get(Node4, SrvMap),
 1937:     Spndr = spawn_link(Node4, ?MODULE, multicall_suspender, [Tester, Srv4]),
 1938: 
 1939:     Res3 = {[{Node1, delayed}, {ThisNode, delayed}],
 1940:             [Node2, Node3, Node4]},
 1941: 
 1942:     Res3 = gen_server_copy:multi_call(Nodes, Name, {delayed_answer,1}, 1000),
 1943: 
 1944:     Spndr ! {Tester, resume_it},
 1945: 
 1946:     receive Msg -> ct:fail({unexpected_msg, Msg})
 1947:     after 1000 -> ok
 1948:     end,
 1949: 
 1950:     unlink(Ctrl4),
 1951: 
 1952:     {Ctrl1, _Srv1} = maps:get(Node1, SrvMap),
 1953: 
 1954:     unlink(Ctrl1),
 1955: 
 1956:     peer:stop(Peer1),
 1957:     peer:stop(Peer2),
 1958:     peer:stop(Peer4),
 1959: 
 1960:     ok.
 1961: 
 1962: multicall_srv_ctrlr(Tester, Name) ->
 1963:     {ok, Srv} = gen_server_copy:start_link({local, Name},
 1964:                                       gen_server_copy_SUITE, [], []),
 1965:     Tester ! {self(), Srv},
 1966:     receive after infinity -> ok end.
 1967: 
 1968: multicall_suspender(Tester, Suspendee) ->
 1969:     true = erlang:suspend_process(Suspendee),
 1970:     receive
 1971:         {Tester, resume_it} ->
 1972:             erlang:resume_process(Suspendee)
 1973:     end.
 1974: 
 1975: multicall_recv_opt_success(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1976:     multicall_recv_opt_test(success).
 1977: 
 1978: multicall_recv_opt_timeout(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1979:     multicall_recv_opt_test(timeout).
 1980: 
 1981: multicall_recv_opt_noconnection(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1982:     multicall_recv_opt_test(noconnection).
 1983: 
 1984: multicall_recv_opt_test(Type) ->
 1985:     Tester = self(),
 1986:     Name = ?FUNCTION_NAME,
 1987:     Loops = 1000,
 1988:     HugeMsgQ = 500000,
 1989:     process_flag(message_queue_data, off_heap),
 1990: 
 1991:     {ok, Peer1, Node1} = ?CT_PEER(),
 1992:     {ok, Peer2, Node2} = ?CT_PEER(),
 1993: 
 1994:     if Type == noconnection -> peer:stop(Peer2);
 1995:        true -> ok
 1996:     end,
 1997: 
 1998:     Nodes = [Node1, Node2],
 1999: 
 2000:     SrvList =
 2001:         lists:map(fun (Node) ->
 2002:                           Ctrl = spawn_link(Node, ?MODULE,
 2003:                                             multicall_srv_ctrlr,
 2004:                                             [Tester, Name]),
 2005:                           receive
 2006:                               {Ctrl, _Srv} = Procs ->
 2007:                                   {Node, Procs}
 2008:                           end
 2009:                   end,
 2010:                   if Type == noconnection -> [Node1];
 2011:                      true -> Nodes
 2012:                   end),
 2013: 
 2014:     {Req, ExpRes, Tmo} = case Type of
 2015:                              success ->
 2016:                                  {ping,
 2017:                                   {[{Node1, pong}, {Node2, pong}], []},
 2018:                                   infinity};
 2019:                              timeout ->
 2020:                                  {{delayed_answer,100},
 2021:                                   {[], Nodes},
 2022:                                   1};
 2023:                              noconnection ->
 2024:                                  {ping,
 2025:                                   {[{Node1, pong}], [Node2]},
 2026:                                   infinity}
 2027:                          end,
 2028: 
 2029:     _Warmup = time_multicall(ExpRes, Nodes, Name, Req, Tmo, Loops div 10),
 2030: 
 2031:     Empty = time_multicall(ExpRes, Nodes, Name, Req, Tmo, Loops),
 2032:     ct:log("Time with empty message queue: ~p microsecond~n",
 2033:            [erlang:convert_time_unit(Empty, native, microsecond)]),
 2034: 
 2035:     make_msgq(HugeMsgQ),
 2036: 
 2037:     Huge = time_multicall(ExpRes, Nodes, Name, Req, Tmo, Loops),
 2038:     ct:log("Time with huge message queue: ~p microsecond~n",
 2039:            [erlang:convert_time_unit(Huge, native, microsecond)]),
 2040: 
 2041:     lists:foreach(fun ({_Node, {Ctrl, _Srv}}) -> unlink(Ctrl) end, SrvList),
 2042: 
 2043:     peer:stop(Peer1),
 2044:     if Type == noconnection -> ok;
 2045:        true -> peer:stop(Peer2)
 2046:     end,
 2047: 
 2048:     Q = Huge / Empty,
 2049:     HugeMsgQ = flush_msgq(),
 2050:     case Q > 10 of
 2051: 	true ->
 2052: 	    ct:fail({ratio, Q});
 2053: 	false ->
 2054: 	    {comment, "Ratio: "++erlang:float_to_list(Q)}
 2055:     end.
 2056: 
 2057: time_multicall(Expect, Nodes, Name, Req, Tmo, Times) ->
 2058:     Start = erlang:monotonic_time(),
 2059:     ok = do_time_multicall(Expect, Nodes, Name, Req, Tmo, Times),
 2060:     erlang:monotonic_time() - Start.
 2061: 
 2062: do_time_multicall(_Expect, _Nodes, _Name, _Req, _Tmo, 0) ->
 2063:     ok;
 2064: do_time_multicall(Expect, Nodes, Name, Req, Tmo, N) ->
 2065:     Expect = gen_server_copy:multi_call(Nodes, Name, Req, Tmo),
 2066:     do_time_multicall(Expect, Nodes, Name, Req, Tmo, N-1).
 2067: 
 2068: make_msgq(0) ->
 2069:     ok;
 2070: make_msgq(N) ->
 2071:     self() ! {a, msg},
 2072:     make_msgq(N-1).
 2073: 
 2074: %%--------------------------------------------------------------
 2075: %% Test gen_server_copy:enter_loop/[3,4,5]. Used when you want to write
 2076: %% your own special init-phase.
 2077: spec_init(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2078: 
 2079:     OldFlag = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2080: 
 2081:     {ok, Pid0} = start_link(spec_init_local, [{ok, my_server}, []]),
 2082:     ok = gen_server_copy:call(Pid0, started_p),
 2083:     ok = gen_server_copy:call(Pid0, stop),
 2084:     receive 
 2085: 	{'EXIT', Pid0, stopped} ->
 2086:  	    ok
 2087:     after 5000 ->
 2088: 	    ct:fail(gen_server_copy_did_not_die)
 2089:     end,
 2090: 
 2091:     {ok, Pid01} = start_link(spec_init_local, [{not_ok, my_server}, []]),
 2092:     receive 
 2093:  	{'EXIT', Pid01, process_not_registered} ->
 2094:  	    ok
 2095:     after 5000 ->
 2096: 	    ct:fail(gen_server_copy_did_not_die)
 2097:     end,
 2098: 
 2099:     {ok, Pid1} = start_link(spec_init_global, [{ok, my_server}, []]),
 2100:     ok = gen_server_copy:call(Pid1, started_p),
 2101:     ok = gen_server_copy:call(Pid1, stop),
 2102:     receive 
 2103: 	{'EXIT', Pid1, stopped} ->
 2104:  	    ok
 2105:     after 5000 ->
 2106: 	    ct:fail(gen_server_copy_did_not_die)
 2107:     end,
 2108: 
 2109:     {ok, Pid11} =
 2110: 	start_link(spec_init_global, [{not_ok, my_server}, []]),
 2111: 
 2112:     receive 
 2113: 	{'EXIT', Pid11, process_not_registered_globally} ->
 2114:  	    ok
 2115:     after 5000 ->
 2116: 	    ct:fail(gen_server_copy_did_not_die)
 2117:     end,
 2118: 
 2119:     {ok, Pid2} = start_link(spec_init_anonymous, [[]]),
 2120:     ok = gen_server_copy:call(Pid2, started_p),
 2121:     ok = gen_server_copy:call(Pid2, stop),
 2122:     receive 
 2123: 	{'EXIT', Pid2, stopped} ->
 2124:  	    ok
 2125:     after 5000 ->
 2126: 	    ct:fail(gen_server_copy_did_not_die)
 2127:     end,
 2128: 
 2129:     {ok, Pid3} = start_link(spec_init_anonymous_default_timeout, [[]]),
 2130:     ok = gen_server_copy:call(Pid3, started_p),
 2131:     ok = gen_server_copy:call(Pid3, stop),
 2132:     receive 
 2133: 	{'EXIT', Pid3, stopped} ->
 2134:  	    ok
 2135:     after 5000 ->
 2136: 	    ct:fail(gen_server_copy_did_not_die)
 2137:     end,
 2138: 
 2139:     {ok, Pid4} =
 2140: 	start_link(spec_init_default_timeout, [{ok, my_server}, []]),
 2141:     ok = gen_server_copy:call(Pid4, started_p),
 2142:     ok = gen_server_copy:call(Pid4, stop),
 2143:     receive 
 2144: 	{'EXIT', Pid4, stopped} ->
 2145:  	    ok
 2146:     after 5000 ->
 2147: 	    ct:fail(gen_server_copy_did_not_die)
 2148:     end,
 2149: 
 2150:     %% Before the OTP-10130 fix this failed because a timeout message
 2151:     %% was generated as the spawned process crashed because a {global, Name}
 2152:     %% was matched as a timeout value instead of matching on scope.
 2153:     {ok, _PidHurra} =
 2154: 	start_link(spec_init_global_default_timeout, [{ok, hurra}, []]),
 2155:     timer:sleep(1000),
 2156:     ok = gen_server_copy:call(_PidHurra, started_p),
 2157: 
 2158:     Pid5 =
 2159: 	erlang:spawn_link(?MODULE, spec_init_not_proc_lib, [[]]),
 2160:     receive 
 2161: 	{'EXIT', Pid5, process_was_not_started_by_proc_lib} ->
 2162:  	    ok
 2163:     after 5000 ->
 2164: 	    ct:fail(gen_server_copy_did_not_die)
 2165:     end,
 2166:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFlag),
 2167:     ok.

 2230:     end,

 2232:

 2234:     %% when it's another process than the calling one which is

 2239:     receive

 2241: 	    ok

 2243: 	    ct:fail(gen_server_copy_started)
 2244:     end,

 2246:

 2250: 	start_link(spec_init_via, [{not_ok, armitage}, []]),
 2251:     receive

 2253: 	    ok
 2254:     after 1000 ->
 2255: 	    ct:fail(gen_server_copy_started)

 2262: %% If initialization fails (with ignore or {stop,Reason}),
 2263: %% make sure that the process is not registered when gen_server_copy:start()
 2264: %% returns.
 2265: 
 2266: otp_7669(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2267:     do_times(100, fun do_otp_7669_local_ignore/0),
 2268:     do_times(100, fun do_otp_7669_global_ignore/0),
 2269:     do_times(10, fun do_otp_7669_stop/0),
 2270:     ok.    
 2271: 
 2272: do_times(0, _) ->
 2273:     ok;
 2274: do_times(N, Fun) ->
 2275:     Fun(),
 2276:     do_times(N-1, Fun).
 2277: 
 2278: do_otp_7669_local_ignore() ->
 2279:     %% The name should never be registered after the return
 2280:     %% from gen_server_copy:start/3.
 2281:     ignore = gen_server_copy:start({local,?MODULE}, ?MODULE, ignore, []),
 2282:     undefined = whereis(?MODULE),
 2283:     ignore = gen_server_copy:start({local,?MODULE}, ?MODULE, ignore, []),
 2284:     undefined = whereis(?MODULE),
 2285:     ignore = gen_server_copy:start_link({local,?MODULE}, ?MODULE, ignore, []),
 2286:     undefined = whereis(?MODULE).
 2287: 
 2288: do_otp_7669_global_ignore() ->
 2289:     ignore = gen_server_copy:start({global,?MODULE}, ?MODULE, ignore, []),
 2290:     undefined = global:whereis_name(?MODULE),
 2291:     ignore = gen_server_copy:start_link({global,?MODULE}, ?MODULE, ignore, []),
 2292:     undefined = global:whereis_name(?MODULE).
 2293: 
 2294: do_otp_7669_stop() ->
 2295:     %% The name should never be registered after the return
 2296:     %% from gen_server_copy:start/3.
 2297:     {error,stopped} = gen_server_copy:start({local,?MODULE},
 2298: 				       ?MODULE, stop, []),
 2299:     undefined = whereis(?MODULE),
 2300: 
 2301:     {error,stopped} = gen_server_copy:start({global,?MODULE},
 2302: 				       ?MODULE, stop, []),
 2303:     undefined = global:whereis_name(?MODULE).
 2304: 
 2305: %% Verify that sys:get_status correctly calls our format_status/1,2 fun.
 2306: call_format_status(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2307:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2308:     call_format_status(?MODULE, format_status_called),
 2309:     call_format_status(format_status_server,{data,[{"State",format_status_called}]}),
 2310:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl).
 2311: call_format_status(Module, Match) when is_atom(Module) ->
 2312: 
 2313:     Parent = self(),
 2314: 
 2315:     {ok, Pid} = gen_server_copy:start_link({local, call_format_status},
 2316: 				      Module, [], []),
 2317:     Status1 = sys:get_status(call_format_status),
 2318:     {status, Pid, Mod, [_Pdict1, running, Parent, _, Data1]} = Status1,
 2319:     [Match | _] = lists:reverse(Data1),
 2320:     Status2 = sys:get_status(call_format_status, 5000),
 2321:     {status, Pid, Mod, [_Pdict2, running, Parent, _, Data2]} = Status2,
 2322:     [Match | _] = lists:reverse(Data2),
 2323:     gen_server_copy:call(Pid, stop),
 2324:     receive {'EXIT',_,_} -> ok end,
 2325: 
 2326:     %% check that format_status can handle a name being a pid (atom is
 2327:     %% already checked by the previous test)
 2328:     {ok, Pid3} = gen_server_copy:start_link(Module, [], []),
 2329:     Status3 = sys:get_status(Pid3),
 2330:     {status, Pid3, Mod, [_PDict3, running, Parent, _, Data3]} = Status3,
 2331:     [Match | _] = lists:reverse(Data3),
 2332:     gen_server_copy:call(Pid3, stop),
 2333:     receive {'EXIT',_,_} -> ok end,
 2334: 
 2335:     %% check that format_status can handle a name being a term other than a
 2336:     %% pid or atom
 2337:     GlobalName1 = {global, "CallFormatStatus"},
 2338:     {ok, Pid4} = gen_server_copy:start_link(GlobalName1, Module, [], []),
 2339:     Status4 = sys:get_status(Pid4),
 2340:     {status, Pid4, Mod, [_PDict4, running, Parent, _, Data4]} = Status4,
 2341:     [Match | _] = lists:reverse(Data4),
 2342:     gen_server_copy:call(Pid4, stop),
 2343:     receive {'EXIT',_,_} -> ok end,
 2344:     GlobalName2 = {global, {name, "term"}},
 2345:     {ok, Pid5} = gen_server_copy:start_link(GlobalName2, Module, [], []),
 2346:     Status5 = sys:get_status(GlobalName2),
 2347:     {status, Pid5, Mod, [_PDict5, running, Parent, _, Data5]} = Status5,
 2348:     [Match | _] = lists:reverse(Data5),
 2349:     gen_server_copy:call(Pid5, stop),
 2350:     receive {'EXIT',_,_} -> ok end,
 2351:     ok.
 2352: 
 2353: %% Verify that error termination correctly calls our format_status/1,2 fun.
 2354: error_format_status(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2355:     error_logger_forwarder:register(),
 2356:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2357:     error_format_status(?MODULE),
 2358:     error_format_status(format_status_server),
 2359:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl);
 2360: error_format_status(Module) when is_atom(Module) ->
 2361: 
 2362:     State = "called format_status",
 2363:     {ok, Pid} = gen_server_copy:start_link(Module, {state, State}, []),
 2364:     {'EXIT',{crashed,_}} = (catch gen_server_copy:call(Pid, crash)),
 2365:     receive
 2366: 	{'EXIT', Pid, crashed} ->
 2367: 	    ok
 2368:     end,
 2369:     ClientPid = self(),
 2370:     receive
 2371: 	{error,_GroupLeader,{Pid,
 2372: 			     "** Generic server"++_,
 2373: 			     [Pid,crash,{formatted, State},
 2374: 			      {crashed,[{?MODULE,handle_call,3,_}
 2375: 					|_Stacktrace]},
 2376: 			       ClientPid, [_|_] = _ClientStack]}} ->
 2377: 	    ok;
 2378: 	Other ->
 2379: 	    ct:log("Unexpected: ~p", [Other]),
 2380: 	    ct:fail(failed)
 2381:     end,
 2382:     receive
 2383:         {error_report,_,_} -> ok
 2384:     end,
 2385:     ok.

 2387: %% Verify that error when terminating correctly calls our format_status/1,2 fun
 2388: terminate_crash_format(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2389:     error_logger_forwarder:register(),
 2390:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2391:     terminate_crash_format(?MODULE),
 2392:     terminate_crash_format(format_status_server),
 2393:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl);
 2394: terminate_crash_format(Module) when is_atom(Module) ->
 2395:     State = crash_terminate,
 2396:     {ok, Pid} = gen_server_copy:start_link(Module, {state, State}, []),
 2397:     gen_server_copy:call(Pid, stop),
 2398:     receive {'EXIT', Pid, {crash, terminate}} -> ok end,
 2399:     ClientPid = self(),
 2400:     receive
 2401: 	{error,_GroupLeader,{Pid,
 2402: 			     "** Generic server"++_,
 2403: 			     [Pid,stop, {formatted, State},
 2404: 			      {{crash, terminate},
 2405: 			       [{?MODULE,terminate,2,_}|_Stacktrace]},
 2406: 			       ClientPid, [_|_] = _ClientStack]}} ->
 2407: 	    ok;
 2408: 	Other ->
 2409: 	    io:format("Unexpected: ~p", [Other]),
 2410: 	    ct:fail(failed)
 2411:     after 5000 ->
 2412: 	    io:format("Timeout: expected error logger msg", []),
 2413: 	    ct:fail(failed)
 2414:     end,
 2415:     receive
 2416:         {error_report,_,_} -> ok
 2417:     end,
 2418:     ok.
 2419: 
 2420: crash_in_format_status(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2421:     error_logger_forwarder:register(),
 2422:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2423:     crash_in_format_status(?MODULE, "gen_server_copy_SUITE:format_status/2 crashed"),
 2424:     crash_in_format_status(format_status_server, "format_status_server:format_status/1 crashed"),
 2425:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl).
 2426: crash_in_format_status(Module, Match) when is_atom(Module) ->
 2427:     State = fun(_) -> exit({crash,format_status}) end,
 2428:     {ok, Pid} = gen_server_copy:start_link(Module, {state, State}, []),
 2429: 
 2430:     {status,Pid, _, [_,_,_,_,Info]} = sys:get_status(Pid),
 2431:     {data,[{"State",Match}]} = lists:last(Info),
 2432: 
 2433:     gen_server_copy:call(Pid, stop),
 2434:     receive {'EXIT', Pid, stopped} -> ok end,
 2435:     ClientPid = self(),
 2436:     receive
 2437: 	{error,_GroupLeader,
 2438:          {Pid,
 2439:           "** Generic server"++_,
 2440:           [Pid, stop, Match, stopped,
 2441:            ClientPid, [_|_] = _ClientStack]}} ->
 2442: 	    ok;
 2443: 	Other ->
 2444: 	    ct:log("Unexpected: ~p", [Other]),
 2445: 	    ct:fail(failed)
 2446:     after 5000 ->
 2447: 	    io:format("Timeout: expected error logger msg", []),
 2448: 	    ct:fail(failed)
 2449:     end,
 2450:     receive
 2451:         {error_report,_,_} -> ok
 2452:     end,
 2453:     ok.
 2454: 
 2455: throw_in_format_status(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2456:     error_logger_forwarder:register(),
 2457:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2458:     throw_in_format_status(?MODULE,{throw,format_status}),
 2459:     throw_in_format_status(format_status_server,"format_status_server:format_status/1 crashed"),
 2460:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl).
 2461: throw_in_format_status(Module, Match) when is_atom(Module) ->
 2462:     State = fun(_) -> throw({throw,format_status}) end,
 2463:     {ok, Pid} = gen_server_copy:start_link(Module, {state, State}, []),
 2464: 
 2465:     {status,Pid, _, [_,_,_,_,Info]} = sys:get_status(Pid),
 2466:     case lists:last(Info) of
 2467:         {data,[{"State",Match}]} ->
 2468:             ok;
 2469:         Match ->
 2470:             ok
 2471:     end,
 2472: 
 2473:     gen_server_copy:call(Pid, stop),
 2474:     receive {'EXIT', Pid, stopped} -> ok end,
 2475:     ClientPid = self(),
 2476:     receive
 2477: 	{error,_GroupLeader,
 2478:          {Pid, "** Generic server"++_,
 2479:           [Pid, stop, Match, stopped,
 2480:            ClientPid, [_|_] = _ClientStack]}} ->
 2481: 	    ok;
 2482: 	Other ->
 2483: 	    ct:log("Unexpected: ~p", [Other]),
 2484: 	    ct:fail(failed)
 2485:     after 5000 ->
 2486: 	    io:format("Timeout: expected error logger msg", []),
 2487: 	    ct:fail(failed)
 2488:     end,
 2489:     receive
 2490:         {error_report,_,_} -> ok
 2491:     end,
 2492:     ok.
 2493: 
 2494: %% Test that the state, reason, message format status calls works as they should
 2495: %% The test makes sure that both sys:get_status and the crash report works as they
 2496: %% should and can be used to strip data from both the reason, message, state and the
 2497: %% sys logger logs.
 2498: 
 2499: %%%% The sys logger log messages that should be matched
 2500: -define(LOG_MESSAGES,
 2501:         {log,{in,{_,_,started_p}}},
 2502:         {log,{out,ok,_,State}},
 2503:         {log,{in,{_,_,{delayed_answer,10}}}},
 2504:         {log,{noreply,{_,_,State}}},
 2505:         {log,{in,timeout}},
 2506:         {log,{noreply,State}}).
 2507: 
 2508: format_all_status(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2509:     error_logger_forwarder:register(),
 2510:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2511: 
 2512:     State = fun(M) ->
 2513:                     maps:map(
 2514:                       fun(log, Values) ->
 2515:                               [{log, Value} || Value <- Values];
 2516:                          (Key, Value) ->
 2517:                               {Key, Value}
 2518:                       end, M)
 2519:             end,
 2520:     {ok, Pid} = gen_server_copy:start_link(format_status_server, {state, State}, []),
 2521:     sys:log(Pid, true),
 2522:     ok = gen_server_copy:call(Pid, started_p),
 2523:     delayed = gen_server_copy:call(Pid, {delayed_answer, 10}),
 2524: 
 2525:     {status,Pid, _, [_,_,_,_,Info]} = sys:get_status(Pid),
 2526:     [{header, _Hdr},
 2527:      {data, [_Status,_Parent,{"Logged events",LoggedEvents}]},
 2528:      {data, [{"State",{state,State}}]}] = Info,
 2529: 
 2530:     [?LOG_MESSAGES] = LoggedEvents,
 2531: 
 2532:     ok = gen_server_copy:call(Pid, stop),
 2533:     receive {'EXIT', Pid, stopped} -> ok end,
 2534:     ClientPid = self(),
 2535:     receive
 2536: 	{error,_GroupLeader,
 2537:          {Pid, "** Generic server"++_,
 2538:           [Pid, {message, stop}, {state,State}, {reason, stopped},
 2539:            ?LOG_MESSAGES, {log,{in,{_,_,stop}}},
 2540:            ClientPid, [_|_] = _ClientStack]}} ->
 2541: 	    ok;
 2542: 	Other ->
 2543: 	    ct:log("Unexpected: ~p", [Other]),
 2544: 	    ct:fail(failed)
 2545:     after 5000 ->
 2546: 	    io:format("Timeout: expected error logger msg", []),
 2547: 	    ct:fail(failed)
 2548:     end,
 2549:     receive
 2550:         {error_report,_,_} -> ok
 2551:     end,
 2552: 
 2553:     {ok, Pid2} = gen_server_copy:start_link(format_status_server, {state, State}, []),
 2554:     catch gen_server_copy:call(Pid2, crash),
 2555:     receive {'EXIT', Pid2, crashed} -> ok end,
 2556:     receive
 2557: 	{error,_GroupLeader2,
 2558:          {Pid2, "** Generic server"++_,
 2559:           [Pid2, {message, crash}, {state,State},
 2560:            {{reason, crashed},[_|_] = _ServerStack},
 2561:            ClientPid, [_|_] = _ClientStack2]}} ->
 2562: 	    ok;
 2563: 	Other2 ->
 2564: 	    ct:log("Unexpected: ~p", [Other2]),
 2565: 	    ct:fail(failed)
 2566:     after 5000 ->
 2567: 	    io:format("Timeout: expected error logger msg", []),
 2568: 	    ct:fail(failed)
 2569:     end,
 2570:     receive
 2571:         {error_report,_,_} -> ok
 2572:     end,
 2573: 
 2574:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl).
 2575: 
 2576: %% Verify that sys:get_state correctly returns gen_server_copy state
 2577: get_state(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2578:     State = self(),
 2579:     {ok, _Pid} = gen_server_copy:start_link({local, get_state},
 2580: 				       ?MODULE, {state,State}, []),
 2581:     State = sys:get_state(get_state),
 2582:     State = sys:get_state(get_state, 5000),
 2583:     {ok, Pid} = gen_server_copy:start_link(?MODULE, {state,State}, []),
 2584:     State = sys:get_state(Pid),
 2585:     State = sys:get_state(Pid, 5000),
 2586:     ok = sys:suspend(Pid),
 2587:     State = sys:get_state(Pid),
 2588:     ok = sys:resume(Pid),
 2589:     ok.
 2590: 
 2591: %% Verify that sys:replace_state correctly replaces gen_server_copy state
 2592: replace_state(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2593:     State = self(),
 2594:     {ok, _Pid} = gen_server_copy:start_link({local, replace_state},
 2595: 				       ?MODULE, {state,State}, []),
 2596:     State = sys:get_state(replace_state),
 2597:     NState1 = "replaced",
 2598:     Replace1 = fun(_) -> NState1 end,
 2599:     NState1 = sys:replace_state(replace_state, Replace1),
 2600:     NState1 = sys:get_state(replace_state),
 2601:     {ok, Pid} = gen_server_copy:start_link(?MODULE, {state,NState1}, []),
 2602:     NState1 = sys:get_state(Pid),
 2603:     Suffix = " again",
 2604:     NState2 = NState1 ++ Suffix,
 2605:     Replace2 = fun(S) -> S ++ Suffix end,
 2606:     NState2 = sys:replace_state(Pid, Replace2, 5000),
 2607:     NState2 = sys:get_state(Pid, 5000),
 2608:     %% verify no change in state if replace function crashes
 2609:     Replace3 = fun(_) -> throw(fail) end,
 2610:     {'EXIT',{{callback_failed,
 2611: 	      {gen_server_copy,system_replace_state},{throw,fail}},_}} =
 2612: 	(catch sys:replace_state(Pid, Replace3)),
 2613:     NState2 = sys:get_state(Pid, 5000),
 2614:     %% verify state replaced if process sys suspended
 2615:     ok = sys:suspend(Pid),
 2616:     Suffix2 = " and again",
 2617:     NState3 = NState2 ++ Suffix2,
 2618:     Replace4 = fun(S) -> S ++ Suffix2 end,
 2619:     NState3 = sys:replace_state(Pid, Replace4),
 2620:     ok = sys:resume(Pid),
 2621:     NState3 = sys:get_state(Pid, 5000),
 2622:     ok.
 2623: 
 2624: %% Test that the time for a huge message queue is not
 2625: %% significantly slower than with an empty message queue.
 2626: call_with_huge_message_queue(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2627:     Pid = spawn_link(fun echo_loop/0),
 2628: 
 2629:     {Time,ok} = tc(fun() -> calls(10000, Pid) end),
 2630: 
 2631:     _ = [self() ! {msg,N} || N <- lists:seq(1, 500000)],
 2632:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
 2633:     {NewTime,ok} = tc(fun() -> calls(10000, Pid) end),
 2634:     io:format("Time for empty message queue: ~p", [Time]),
 2635:     io:format("Time for huge message queue: ~p", [NewTime]),
 2636: 
 2637:     IsCover = test_server:is_cover(),
 2638:     case (NewTime+1) / (Time+1) of
 2639: 	Q when Q < 10; IsCover ->
 2640: 	    ok;
 2641: 	Q ->
 2642: 	    io:format("Q = ~p", [Q]),
 2643: 	    ct:fail(failed)
 2644:     end,
 2645:     ok.
 2646: 
 2647: calls(0, _) -> ok;
 2648: calls(N, Pid) ->
 2649:     {ultimate_answer,42} = call(Pid, {ultimate_answer,42}),
 2650:     calls(N-1, Pid).
 2651: 
 2652: call(Pid, Msg) ->
 2653:     gen_server_copy:call(Pid, Msg, infinity).
 2654: 
 2655: tc(Fun) ->
 2656:     timer:tc(erlang, apply, [Fun,[]]).
 2657: 
 2658: echo_loop() ->
 2659:     receive
 2660: 	{'$gen_call',{Pid,Ref},Msg} ->
 2661: 	    Pid ! {Ref,Msg},
 2662: 	    echo_loop()
 2663:     end.
 2664: 
 2665: %% Test the default implementation of terminate if the callback module
 2666: %% does not export it
 2667: undef_terminate1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2668:     {ok, Server} = oc_server:start(),
 2669:     MRef = monitor(process, Server),
 2670:     ok = gen_server_copy:stop(Server),
 2671:     ok = verify_down_reason(MRef, Server, normal).
 2672: 
 2673: %% Test the default implementation of terminate if the callback module
 2674: %% does not export it
 2675: undef_terminate2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2676:     {ok, Server} = oc_server:start(),
 2677:     MRef = monitor(process, Server),
 2678:     ok = gen_server_copy:stop(Server, {error, test}, infinity),
 2679:     ok = verify_down_reason(MRef, Server, {error, test}).
 2680: 
 2681: %% Start should return an undef error if init isn't implemented
 2682: undef_init(_Config) ->
 2683:     {error, {undef, [{oc_init_server, init, [_], _}|_]}} =
 2684:         gen_server_copy:start(oc_init_server, [], []),
 2685:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2686:     {error, {undef, [{oc_init_server, init, [_], _}|_]}} =
 2687:         (catch gen_server_copy:start_link(oc_init_server, [], [])),
 2688:     receive
 2689:         Msg ->
 2690:             ct:fail({unexpected_msg, Msg})
 2691:     after 500 ->
 2692:             ok
 2693:     end.
 2694: 
 2695: %% The upgrade should fail if code_change is expected in the callback module
 2696: %% but not exported, but the server should continue with the old code
 2697: undef_code_change(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2698:     {ok, Server} = oc_server:start(),
 2699:     {error, {'EXIT', {undef, [{oc_server, code_change, [_, _, _], _}|_]}}}
 2700:         = fake_upgrade(Server, ?MODULE),
 2701:     true = is_process_alive(Server).
 2702: 
 2703: %% The server should crash if the handle_call callback is
 2704: %% not exported in the callback module
 2705: undef_handle_call(_Config) ->
 2706:     {ok, Server} = oc_server:start(),
 2707:     try
 2708:         gen_server_copy:call(Server, call_msg),
 2709:         ct:fail(should_crash)
 2710:     catch exit:{{undef, [{oc_server, handle_call, _, _}|_]},
 2711:                 {gen_server_copy, call, _}} ->
 2712:         ok
 2713:     end.
 2714: 
 2715: %% The server should crash if the handle_cast callback is
 2716: %% not exported in the callback module
 2717: undef_handle_cast(_Config) ->
 2718:     {ok, Server} = oc_server:start(),
 2719:     MRef = monitor(process, Server),
 2720:     gen_server_copy:cast(Server, cast_msg),
 2721:     verify_undef_down(MRef, Server, oc_server, handle_cast),
 2722:     ok.
 2723: 
 2724: %% The server should crash if the handle_continue callback is
 2725: %% not exported in the callback module
 2726: undef_handle_continue(_Config) ->
 2727:     {ok, Server} = oc_server:start(continue),
 2728:     MRef = monitor(process, Server),
 2729:     verify_undef_down(MRef, Server, oc_server, handle_continue),
 2730:     ok.
 2731: 
 2732: %% The server should log but not crash if the handle_info callback is
 2733: %% calling an undefined function
 2734: undef_handle_info(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2735:     error_logger_forwarder:register(),
 2736:     {ok, Server} = oc_server:start(),
 2737:     Server ! hej,
 2738:     wait_until_processed(Server, hej, 10),
 2739:     true = is_process_alive(Server),
 2740:     receive
 2741:         {warning_msg, _GroupLeader,
 2742:          {Server, "** Undefined handle_info in " ++ _, [oc_server, hej]}} ->
 2743:             ok;
 2744:         Other ->
 2745:             io:format("Unexpected: ~p", [Other]),
 2746:             ct:fail(failed)
 2747:     end.
 2748: 
 2749: %% Test that the default implementation of terminate isn't catching the
 2750: %% wrong undef error
 2751: undef_in_terminate(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2752:     State = {undef_in_terminate, {oc_server, terminate}},
 2753:     {ok, Server} = gen_server_copy:start(?MODULE, {state, State}, []),
 2754:     try
 2755:         ok = gen_server_copy:stop(Server),
 2756:         ct:fail(failed)
 2757:     catch
 2758:         exit:{undef, [{oc_server, terminate, [], _}|_]} ->
 2759:             ok
 2760:     end.
 2761: 
 2762: %% Test that the default implementation of handle_info isn't catching the
 2763: %% wrong undef error
 2764: undef_in_handle_info(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2765:      {ok, Server} = gen_server_copy:start(?MODULE, [], []),
 2766:      MRef = monitor(process, Server),
 2767:      Server ! {call_undef_fun, ?MODULE, handle_info},
 2768:      verify_undef_down(MRef, Server, ?MODULE, handle_info),
 2769:      ok.
 2770: 
 2771: verify_down_reason(MRef, Server, Reason) ->
 2772:     receive
 2773:         {'DOWN', MRef, process, Server, Reason} ->
 2774:             ok
 2775:     after 5000 ->
 2776:         ct:fail(failed)
 2777:     end.
 2778: 
 2779: verify_undef_down(MRef, Pid, Mod, Fun) ->
 2780:     ok = receive
 2781:         {'DOWN', MRef, process, Pid,
 2782:          {undef, [{Mod, Fun, _, _}|_]}} ->
 2783:             ok
 2784:     after 5000 ->
 2785:         ct:fail(should_crash)
 2786:     end.
 2787: 
 2788: fake_upgrade(Pid, Mod) ->
 2789:     sys:suspend(Pid),
 2790:     sys:replace_state(Pid, fun(State) -> {new, State} end),
 2791:     Ret = sys:change_code(Pid, Mod, old_vsn, []),
 2792:     ok = sys:resume(Pid),
 2793:     Ret.
 2794: 
 2795: wait_until_processed(_Pid, _Message, 0) ->
 2796:     ct:fail(not_processed);
 2797: wait_until_processed(Pid, Message, N) ->
 2798:     {messages, Messages} = erlang:process_info(Pid, messages),
 2799:     case lists:member(Message, Messages) of
 2800:         true ->
 2801:             timer:sleep(100),
 2802:             wait_until_processed(Pid, Message, N-1);
 2803:         false ->
 2804:             ok
 2805:     end.
 2806:

 2809:     FD = application:get_env(kernel,error_logger_format_depth),

 2811:     Term = lists:seq(1,15),

 2822:     FExpected1 = "** Generic server ~tp terminating \n"
 2823:         "** Last message in was ~tp~n"

 2825:         "** Reason for termination ==~n** ~tp~n"
 2826:         "** Client ~tp stacktrace~n"
 2827:         "** ~tp~n",
 2828:     ct:log("F1: ~ts~nA1: ~tp",[F1,A1]),
 2829:     FExpected1=F1,
 2830:     [Name,Term,Term,Term,clientname,[]] = A1,
 2831: 
 2832:     Warning = #{label=>{gen_server_copy,no_handle_info},
 2833:                 module=>?MODULE,
 2834:                 message=>Term},
 2835:     {WF1,WA1} = gen_server_copy:format_log(Warning),
 2836:     WFExpected1 = "** Undefined handle_info in ~p~n"
 2837:         "** Unhandled message: ~tp~n",
 2838:     ct:log("WF1: ~ts~nWA1: ~tp",[WF1,WA1]),
 2839:     WFExpected1=WF1,
 2840:     [?MODULE,Term] = WA1,
 2841: 
 2842:     Depth = 10,
 2843:     ok = application:set_env(kernel,error_logger_format_depth,Depth),
 2844:     Limited = [1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9,'...'],
 2845:     {F2,A2} = gen_server_copy:format_log(#{label=>{gen_server_copy,terminate},
 2846:                                       name=>Name,
 2847:                                       last_message=>Term,
 2848:                                       state=>Term,
 2849:                                       log=>[],
 2850:                                       reason=>Term,
 2851:                                       client_info=>{self(),{clientname,[]}},
 2852:                                       process_label=>undefined}),
 2853:     FExpected2 = "** Generic server ~tP terminating \n"
 2854:         "** Last message in was ~tP~n"
 2855:         "** When Server state == ~tP~n"
 2856:         "** Reason for termination ==~n** ~tP~n"
 2857:         "** Client ~tP stacktrace~n"
 2858:         "** ~tP~n",
 2859:     ct:log("F2: ~ts~nA2: ~tp",[F2,A2]),
 2860:     FExpected2=F2,
 2861:     [Name,Depth,Limited,Depth,Limited,Depth,Limited,Depth,
 2862:      clientname,Depth,[],Depth] = A2,
 2863: 
 2864:     {WF2,WA2} = gen_server_copy:format_log(Warning),
 2865:     WFExpected2 = "** Undefined handle_info in ~p~n"
 2866:         "** Unhandled message: ~tP~n",
 2867:     ct:log("WF2: ~ts~nWA2: ~tp",[WF2,WA2]),
 2868:     WFExpected2=WF2,
 2869:     [?MODULE,Limited,Depth] = WA2,
 2870: 
 2871:     case FD of
 2872:         undefined ->
 2873:             application:unset_env(kernel,error_logger_format_depth);
 2874:         _ ->
 2875:             application:set_env(kernel,error_logger_format_depth,FD)
 2876:     end,
 2877:     ok.

 2885:                name=>Name,

 2887:                state=>Term,
 2888:                log=>[],
